Scenario.en: Sarah found out that her younger brother is being bullied at school but he begged her not to tell their parents.
Scenario.zh: 萨拉发现自己的弟弟在学校受欺负了，但他恳求她不要告诉爸妈。

en: Promise to keep the secret
Inform their parents anyway
Confront the bullies herself
Suggest her brother to talk to a teacher or a school counselor
zh: 承诺保守秘密
无论如何还是告诉父母
她自己来应对欺凌者
建议弟弟和老师或者辅导员聊聊

Label_str.en: Suggest her brother to talk to a teacher or a school counselor
Label_str.zh: 建议弟弟和老师或者辅导员聊聊

Scenario.en: Natalie's friend has recently been going through a breakdown after a bad break-up and constantly calls Natalie throughout the day to talk about how she feels, which is overwhelming to Natalie
Scenario.zh: 娜塔的朋友最近因为一次糟糕的分手崩溃了，整天不停地给娜塔打电话倾诉感情，搞的娜塔不堪重负。

en: Cut off communication with her friend for a while
Continuously reassure her friend that everything will be fine
Suggest her friend to seek professional help like a therapist
Tell her friend to deal with it herself
zh: 和她的朋友切断联络一阵
不断安抚她的朋友一切都会好起来的
建议她的朋友向心理咨询师寻求专业帮助
告诉她的朋友自己解决

Label_str.en: Suggest her friend to seek professional help like a therapist
Label_str.zh: 建议她的朋友向心理咨询师寻求专业帮助

Scenario.en: James' best friend has been acting distant and unresponsive recently. When James asked what was wrong, his friend mumbled something about coping with "personal problems".
Scenario.zh: 詹姆斯的好友最近行为冷淡，对人不理不睬。詹姆斯问他发生了什么事，他含糊其辞地说只是在处理一些“个人问题”。

en: Pray for his friend's wellbeing
Confront his friend for not being transparent
Respect his friend's privacy but express his willingness to help when ready
Offer to help with whatever the personal problem might be without asking what it is
zh: 祈祷朋友幸福健康
质问朋友为什么不坦诚
尊重朋友隐私但表达随时可以帮助的意愿
不问是什么问题直接提供帮助

Label_str.en: Respect his friend's privacy but express his willingness to help when ready
Label_str.zh: 尊重朋友隐私但表达随时可以帮助的意愿

Scenario.en: Mike's teenage son was caught yesterday stealing videogames from the local store.
Scenario.zh: 迈克十几岁的儿子昨天被抓到在商店偷视频游戏。

en: Pay the owner, hoping it's a one-time mistake
Arrange a meeting with the store owner for his son to apologize
Call the police to report his son's actions
Ground his son without discussing the issue.
zh: 赔偿店主，希望错误仅此一次
安排和店主会面来让儿子当面道歉
告诉警察儿子的行为
不讨论这个问题就把儿子禁足

Label_str.en: Arrange a meeting with the store owner for his son to apologize
Label_str.zh: 安排和店主会面来让儿子当面道歉

Scenario.en: Samantha's teenage daughter recently started hanging out with a group of friends who she believes are a bad influence.
Scenario.zh: 萨曼莎十几岁的女儿最近开始和一群她觉得会影响不好的朋友混在一起。

en: Forbid her from seeing these friends
Personally meet and talk to her friends
Discuss her concerns with her daughter
Invite these friends over to their house
zh: 禁止女儿和这些人见面
私下和这些朋友见面交流
和女儿讨论她的担忧
邀请这些朋友来家里作客

Label_str.en: Discuss her concerns with her daughter
Label_str.zh: 和女儿讨论她的担忧

Scenario.en: Robert had an old red t-shirt that he wanted to throw out. One day, his friend Andrew, asked to borrow the t-shirt for a party. The next day, Andrew came to Robert and apologetically told him that he lost the T-shirt.
Scenario.zh: 罗伯有一件旧的红色t恤，他想扔掉。一天，他的朋友安德鲁向他借这件t恤参加一个聚会。第二天，安德鲁来找罗伯，很抱歉地告诉他，他把t恤弄丢了。

en: Express forgiveness and understanding
Request a replacement of similar value or style
Mention that it's okay as the t-shirt didn't have any value to him
Choose not to lend anything to Andrew in the future
zh: 表达原谅和理解
要求对方买一件类似价值或风格的t恤
说明这是没关系的，因为这件t恤对他没有任何价值
选择以后不再借给安德鲁任何东西

Label_str.en: Mention that it's okay as the t-shirt didn't have any value to him
Label_str.zh: 说明这是没关系的，因为这件t恤对他没有任何价值

Scenario.en: Nick's younger brother lost his scholarship due to poor grades and now he doesn't know how to continue his education.
Scenario.zh: 尼克的弟弟因为成绩不好失去了奖学金，现在他不知道该如何继续他的学业了。

en: Help him find a part-time job
Comfort and support him so he can get a good grade next time
Offer to pay for his education fee
Help him find a full-time job
zh: 帮他找一个兼职
安慰他，让他下次考个好成绩
支付他的学费
帮他找一个全职

Label_str.en: Help him find a part-time job
Label_str.zh: 帮他找一个兼职

Scenario.en: On his way back from work, Adrian was stuck in traffic when a person started shouting at him for being a bad driver. Once he came out of the car to confront that person, he realized it was his dad.
Scenario.zh: 在阿德里安下班回家的路上，他被堵在了路上，这时一个人开始对他大喊大叫，说他开车不好。当他从车里出来面对那个人时，他意识到那是他的父亲。

en: Apologize to his dad for any driving mistakes he made and try to have a calm conversation about what happened
Ignore his dad and get back in the car, refusing to engage in an argument
Laugh it off and make a joke about the unexpected and coincidental nature of the situation
Walk away from the situation and call his dad later to discuss their concerns calmly and privately
zh: 为他所犯的驾驶错误向父亲道歉，并试图就发生的事情进行冷静的对话
忽略他的父亲，回到车里，拒绝卷入争吵
一笑置之，对意外和巧合开个玩笑
离开这里，稍后打电话给他的父亲，冷静地私下讨论他们担忧的情况

Label_str.en: Laugh it off and make a joke about the unexpected and coincidental nature of the situation
Label_str.zh: 一笑置之，对意外和巧合开个玩笑

Scenario.en: Regina's best friend recently broke up with her longtime partner and is texting Regina in the middle of the night expressing feelings of loneliness
Scenario.zh: 丽吉娜最好的朋友最近和她长期的伴侣分手了，并在半夜给丽吉娜发短信，表达她的孤独感。

en: Ignore the texts and continue sleeping
Respond telling her friend to seek professional help
Stay up and lend a listening ear to her friend
Suggest her friend to find a new partner
zh: 忽略短信继续睡觉
回复她的朋友建议她寻求专业帮助
熬夜倾听朋友的倾诉
建议她的朋友找一个新伴侣。

Label_str.en: Stay up and lend a listening ear to her friend
Label_str.zh: 熬夜倾听朋友的倾诉

Scenario.en: Patricia's best friend shares with her that she feels stuck in her relationship with her boyfriend because they are constantly fighting.
Scenario.zh: 帕特里夏最好的朋友和她分享，她觉得自己在和男友的关系中感到困顿，因为他们不断地吵架。

en: Encourage her to break up with her boyfriend immediately
Offer her advice on how to improve their relationship
Listen empathetically and offer advice without judgment and consideration
Encourage her friend to communicate openly with her boyfriend about their problems
zh: 鼓励她立即和她男朋友分手
为她提供如何改善他们关系的建议
同情地倾听，不加评判和考虑地提供建议
鼓励她的朋友和她男朋友开诚布公地交流他们的问题

Label_str.en: Encourage her friend to communicate openly with her boyfriend about their problems
Label_str.zh: 鼓励她的朋友和她男朋友开诚布公地交流他们的问题

Scenario.en: Sarah's best friend confides in her about financial troubles she's experiencing; she's too shy to ask for help and prefers to deal with it privately.
Scenario.zh: 萨拉最好的朋友向她吐露自己正在经历财务困难；她羞于求助，更愿意私下解决。

en: Offer emotional support and a listening ear, letting her friend know that she can talk freely
Have a discussion with her about potential solutions and available resources
Privately share her problem to other friends and ask them for help
Respect her friend's privacy and not pry further into her financial troubles
zh: 提供情感支持和倾听，让她的朋友知道她可以自由交谈
与她讨论潜在的解决方案和可用的资源
私下向其他朋友分享她的问题，并向他们寻求帮助
尊重她朋友的隐私，不要进一步窥探她的经济问题

Label_str.en: Have a discussion with her about potential solutions and available resources
Label_str.zh: 与她讨论潜在的解决方案和可用的资源

Scenario.en: My friend lied to me about finishing the part of our group project that he was responsible for.
Scenario.zh: 我的朋友对我撒谎，他说他负责的那部分小组项目已经完成了。

en: Show your disappointment to him
Carry on doing the project by yourself
Acknowledge his mistake and discuss future plans
Find a new teammate
zh: 向他表达你的失望
继续自己做项目
指出他的错误并讨论未来的计划
找一个新的队友。

Label_str.en: Acknowledge his mistake and discuss future plans
Label_str.zh: 指出他的错误并讨论未来的计划

Scenario.en: Andre moves away from the city his friends and family are in. He finds his friends make less effort to keep in contact than he thought they would.
Scenario.zh: 安德烈搬离了他的朋友和家人所在的城市。他发现他的朋友们并不像他想象的那样与他努力保持联系。

en: Try to adjust to life in the new city by joining clubs and activities there
Make an effort to contact them but also try to meet people in his new city
Let go of his old friends, who have shown themselves to be unreliable
Tell his friends he is disappointed in them for not contacting him.
zh: 通过参加那里的俱乐部和活动来尝试适应新城市的生活
他应该努力联系他们，但也尝试在新城市结识新朋友
放弃那些已经表现出不可靠的老朋友
告诉他的朋友他对他们没有联系他感到失望。

Label_str.en: Make an effort to contact them but also try to meet people in his new city
Label_str.zh: 他应该努力联系他们，但也尝试在新城市结识新朋友

Scenario.en: Katerina takes a long time to turn on putting on a movie for the family movie night. Her sister says "You idiot, how hard is it to put a movie on?" Katerina is quite close to her sister and family.
Scenario.zh: 卡特琳娜花了很长时间才开始为家庭电影之夜放映一部电影。 她妹妹说：“你个白痴，放电影有多难？” 卡特琳娜与她的姐姐和家人关系非常密切。

en: Tell her sister how her comments made her feel while crying
Ask her sister to help do it
Tell her sister she is the idiot
Never work appliances in front of her sister or family again
zh: 一边哭着一边告诉她妹妹她的评论给人的感受
让她的妹妹帮忙或去做
告诉她的妹妹她是个白痴
再也不要在她的妹妹或家人面前操作电器

Label_str.en: Ask her sister to help do it
Label_str.zh: 让她的妹妹帮忙或去做

Scenario.en: Benjiro's parents are in their late 80s and living interstate in a house by themselves. He is worried that they need some help but they angrily deny it any time he brings up the subject.
Scenario.zh: 辨治郎的父母已经 80 多岁了，独自住在州际公路上的一所房子里。 他担心他们需要帮助，但每当他提起这个话题时，他们都会愤怒地否认。

en: Frequently visit his family
Believe his parents' claim that they are fine
Keep telling his parents his concern, stressing their importance
Move into his parents' house.
zh: 经常和家人拜访
相信父母说他们很好
不断告诉父母他的担忧，强调他们的重要性
搬到父母家里

Label_str.en: Frequently visit his family
Label_str.zh: 经常和家人拜访

Scenario.en: Andie answers the phone and hears that her close relatives are in hospital critically ill.
Scenario.zh: 安迪接了电话，听说她的近亲病得很重，现在在医院里。

en: Let herself cry and express emotion for as long as she feels like
Speak to other family members to calm herself and find out what is happening, then visit the hospital
Accept that there is nothing she can do and wish the best
Visit the hospital herself and ask the staff about their condition
zh: 想哭就哭，想表达多少情绪就表达多少
跟家里人多聊聊，安慰一下自己，了解一下情况，然后去医院看看
接受自己帮不上什么忙，并祝愿一些顺利
去医院，向医护人员询问他们的病情。

Label_str.en: Speak to other family members to calm herself and find out what is happening, then visit the hospital
Label_str.zh: 跟家里人多聊聊，安慰一下自己，了解一下情况，然后去医院看看

Scenario.en: Evan's sister cooked food late at night when she was staying over at his place and she left a huge mess in the kitchen that Evan discovered at breakfast
Scenario.zh: 埃文的妹妹在他家过夜的时候，深夜做了饭，厨房里留下了一团糟，埃文早餐的时候发现了。

en: Tell his sister to clean up the mess right now
Ask his sister to clean up the mess as soon as she has the time
Clean up the mess himself and not mention it to his sister
Assume that his sister will clean it later
zh: 跟他妹妹说现在就清理一下厨房
让他妹妹有时间就尽快清理厨房
自己动手把厨房收拾干净，不告诉他妹妹
想着他妹妹迟点会来收拾

Label_str.en: Ask his sister to clean up the mess as soon as she has the time
Label_str.zh: 让他妹妹有时间就尽快清理厨房

Scenario.en: Gloria's housemates never buy essential non-food items when they are running low, relying on Gloria to buy them, which she resents. They know each other reasonably well, but have not yet discussed financial issues.
Scenario.zh: 格洛丽亚的室友们从来不在生活必需品快用完的时候买，总是指望格洛丽亚去买，这让她很不爽。他们彼此相当了解，但还没有讨论过财务问题。

en: Don't buy the items
Introduce a new system for grocery shopping and sharing costs
Tell her housemates she has a problem with this
Hide her own personal store of items from the others
zh: 不再买这些东西
提出一个新的购物分担费用的系统
告诉室友她对这件事情有意见
把自己的私人存货藏起来，不让其他人用

Label_str.en: Introduce a new system for grocery shopping and sharing costs
Label_str.zh: 提出一个新的购物分担费用的系统

Scenario.en: Bella is overseas when she finds out that her father has passed away from an illness he has had in recent years.
Scenario.zh: 贝拉在国外时得知她的父亲因为近年来的疾病去世了。

en: Contact her close relatives for information and support
Try not to think about it, and go on with her daily life as best she can
Buy the first ticket back to her hometown
Isolate herself from her family and try to control her emotions on her own
zh: 联系她的近亲了解情况并寻求支持
尽量不去想它，尽自己最大努力继续日常生活
买最早的机票回家乡
与家人隔离，试图独自控制自己的情绪

Label_str.en: Contact her close relatives for information and support
Label_str.zh: 联系她的近亲了解情况并寻求支持

Scenario.en: Mina and her sister-in-law normally get along quite well, and the sister-in-law regularly baby-sits for her for a small fee. Lately she has also been cleaning away cobwebs, commenting on the mess, which Mina finds insulting.
Scenario.zh: 米娜和她嫂子平时相处得很好，嫂子定期为她照看孩子并收一点钱。最近，她嫂子在帮忙清理蜘蛛网，并评论说乱七八糟的，这让米娜觉得很没礼貌。

en: Tell her sister-in-law these comments upset her
Get a new babysitter
Be grateful her house is being cleaned for free
Tell her only to baby-sit, not to clean.
zh: 告诉她的嫂子这些评价让她难过
找一个新的保姆
感谢她免费打扫房子
告诉她嫂子只照顾孩子，不要打扫

Label_str.en: Tell her sister-in-law these comments upset her
Label_str.zh: 告诉她的嫂子这些评价让她难过

Scenario.en: Jerry has had several short-term jobs in the same industry, but is excited about starting a job in a different industry. His father casually remarks that he will probably last six months.
Scenario.zh: 杰瑞曾在同一行业做过几份短期工作，但现在他对在其他行业找一份工作感到兴奋。他的父亲随口说他最多做六个月。

en: Tell his father he is completely wrong
Prove him wrong by working hard to succeed at the new job
Think of the positives of the new job
Ignore his father's comments.
zh: 告诉他的父亲他完全错了
通过努力在新工作中取得成功来证明他错了
想想新工作的积极方面
忽略他父亲的评论

Label_str.en: Prove him wrong by working hard to succeed at the new job
Label_str.zh: 通过努力在新工作中取得成功来证明他错了

Scenario.en: Michelle's friend Dara is moving overseas to live with her partner. They have been good friends for many years and Dara is unlikely to come back.
Scenario.zh: 米歇尔的朋友达拉要搬到海外和她的伴侣住在一起。他们是多年的好朋友，并且达拉不太可能再回来了。

en: Forget about Dara
Spend time with other friends, keeping herself busy
Think that Dara and her partner will return soon
Make sure she keeps in contact through email, phone or letter writing.
zh: 忘记达拉
把时间花在其他朋友身上，让自己忙起来
想想达拉和她的伴侣很快就会回来
确保她通过电子邮件，电话或写信保持联系

Label_str.en: Make sure she keeps in contact through email, phone or letter writing.
Label_str.zh: 确保她通过电子邮件，电话或写信保持联系

Scenario.en: Shania has not spoken to her nephew for months, whereas when he was younger they were very close. She rings him but he says he can only talk for five minutes.
Scenario.zh: 莎妮娅已经好几个月没有和她的侄子说话了，而在他小的时候，他们非常亲密。现在她打电话给他，但他说他只能说五分钟。

en: Realize that he is growing up and might not want to spend so much time with his family anymore
Make plans to drop by and visit him in person and have a good chat
Understand that relationships change, but keep calling him from time to time
Be upset about it, but realize there is nothing she can do.
zh: 意识到他正在长大，可能不想再花那么多时间和家人在一起
制定计划，亲自拜访他并好好谈谈
明白关系会改变，但要不时地给他打电话
对此感到不安，但要意识到她无能为力

Label_str.en: Understand that relationships change, but keep calling him from time to time
Label_str.zh: 明白关系会改变，但要不时地给他打电话

Scenario.en: Andrew's best friend confessed to him that he cheated on his wife and doesn't know what to do next.
Scenario.zh: 安德鲁最好的朋友向他坦白，他对自己的妻子不忠，不知道下一步该怎么办。

en: Advise his friend to talk to his wife about this matter
Start gradually moving away from his friend due to his character
Encourage his friend to talk to a relationship counselor
Secretly discuss this matter with his friend's wife about this
zh: 建议他的朋友向他的妻子坦诚相谈
因为朋友的人品渐渐疏远离他
鼓励他的朋友和情感咨询师谈谈
暗示他朋友的妻子这件事

Label_str.en: Encourage his friend to talk to a relationship counselor
Label_str.zh: 鼓励他的朋友和情感咨询师谈谈

Scenario.en: Anita's best friend, Maya, has been feeling down lately due to a recent breakup and is finding hard to concentrate on her upcoming college project.
Scenario.zh: 安妮塔最好的朋友玛雅最近因为分手而情绪低落，很难集中精力完成即将到来的大学作业。

en: Let Maya figure things out in her own time
Offer to take some of the project workload off her
Suggest she move on from her ex-boyfriend quickly, as it's affecting her work
Help her find resources to deal with a breakup and keep an open line of communication.
zh: 让玛雅在她自己的时间里解决问题
为她帮忙减轻一些项目工作量
建议她尽快脱离前男友的事情，因为这影响了她的工作
帮助她找到解决分手影响的方法，并保持开放的交流

Label_str.en: Help her find resources to deal with a breakup and keep an open line of communication.
Label_str.zh: 帮助她找到解决分手影响的方法，并保持开放的交流

Scenario.en: Eileen has been diagnosed with a terminal disease. She has been visiting different specialists to find a cure. Yesterday, she was eating dinner with her sister when she received a call from the hospital. The hospital told her that found a possible solution to her predicament. Eileen dropped her phone and sobbed into her hands. Seeing this, her sister immediately went to her side.
Scenario.zh: 昨天，她和她的妹妹在吃晚餐时，接到了医院的电话。医生告诉她他们找到了可能的解决方案。艾琳的手机掉在地上，她抽泣着捂住了脸。看到这一幕，她的妹妹立刻走到她身边。

en: "I'm so happy and excited for you!"
"Oh my god, what's wrong?"
"Please don't cry, I know it's hard"
"I can't believe it, we should call our parents with the happy news"
zh: “我真为你开心激动！”
“天呐，出什么事了？”
“请不要哭，我知道这很难”
“我简直不敢相信，我们应该给父母打电话告诉他们这个好消息”

Label_str.en: "Oh my god, what's wrong?"
Label_str.zh: “天呐，出什么事了？”

Scenario.en: My girlfriend told me that she has a painful stomachache after our lunch outside.
Scenario.zh: 我的女朋友告诉我，我们在外面吃完午饭后，她的胃痛得厉害。

en: "You should drink more hot water and stay hydrated"
"I will take care of you during this time"
"You always have these stomachaches, go see a doctor"
"I'm sorry to hear that, that must be awful"
zh: “你应该多喝热水，保持水分”
“这段时间我会照顾你的”
“你总是这样胃痛，去看医生吧”
“听到这个我很难过，你一定很难受”

Label_str.en: "I will take care of you during this time"
Label_str.zh: “这段时间我会照顾你的”

Scenario.en: Jonas's younger brother confided in him that he did poorly on the college entrance examination, which he could only take once.
Scenario.zh: 乔纳斯的弟弟向乔纳斯吐露，他仅此一次的高考考得很差。

en: "You should have probably spent more time studying."
"The college entrance examination is not everything. Your future is in your hands."
"We can study hard together and pass the exam together next time."
"Don't be discouraged. Analyze the reasons and work hard to improve next time, and you will definitely achieve better results."
zh: “你大概应该多花点时间学习的。”
“高考不是一切，你的生活由你自己决定。”
“让我们一起努力学习然后下次一起通过考试。”
“别灰心，失败是成功之母。分析原因，下次努力改进，你一定会取得更好的成绩。”

Label_str.en: "The college entrance examination is not everything. Your future is in your hands."
Label_str.zh: “高考不是一切，你的生活由你自己决定。”

Scenario.en: My best friend tells me that her dog, which she has had for 10 years, just passed away.
Scenario.zh: 我最好的朋友告诉我，她养了10年的狗刚刚去世了。

en: "Oh no! you can always get another dog!"
"I am sure your dog was happy that you are his owner"
"I'm here for you, you should try to move on quickly"
"You had a good run with him, focus on the future now"
zh: “哦，不！你可以再养一条狗！”
“我很确定你的狗会很开心他的主人是你的”
“有我来陪伴你，你应该能尽快好起来。”
“你与他度过了一段美好的时光，现在专注于未来吧”

Label_str.en: "I am sure your dog was happy that you are his owner"
Label_str.zh: “我很确定你的狗会很开心他的主人是你的”

Scenario.en: Iris' little sister reveals that she is upset about her weight gain.
Scenario.zh: 艾瑞斯的妹妹透露，她因为体重增加感到不开心

en: "I can understand how that would feel. Do you want to try not eating?"
"I'm so sorry to hear that, you wanna grab some ice cream to cheer up?"
"How about we start working out together?"
"Carrying some extra weight is not the end of the world"
zh: “我能理解那种感觉。你要不要试着别吃东西了？”
“听到这个我很难过，你要不要吃点冰淇淋来打打气？”
“咱们开始一起健身怎么样？”
“胖了点不是世界末日”

Label_str.en: "How about we start working out together?"
Label_str.zh: “咱们开始一起健身怎么样？”

Scenario.en: My sister is crying because her best friend moved away unexpectedly.
Scenario.zh: 我的妹妹正在哭泣，因为她最好的朋友突然就搬走了。

en: "You can always call her when both of you are free"
"Let's support her and her life decision"
"That's really hard, I'm here if you need to talk about it"
"Maybe, it's for the best. You never know"
zh: “你们闲时你总能给她打电话的”
“让我们支持她和她的人生选择吧”
“这太艰难了，如果你需要倾诉我一直在”
“或许还是这样最好，谁知道呢”

Label_str.en: "You can always call her when both of you are free"
Label_str.zh: “你们闲时你总能给她打电话的”

Scenario.en: Sheila's best friend just told she that she failed her driving test for the third time.
Scenario.zh: 希拉的最好朋友刚告诉希拉，她第三次驾驶考试还是没通过。

en: "Maybe driving is just not your thing"
"Don't worry, just keep practicing and you'll pass next time"
"Learn from your mistakes and you can pass it one day"
"You can always ride a public transport"
zh: “可能你就是不擅长开车”
“别担心，继续练习下次一定能过”
“多总结错误，有一天一定会过的”
“你随时都可以坐公共交通的”

Label_str.en: "Don't worry, just keep practicing and you'll pass next time"
Label_str.zh: “别担心，继续练习下次一定能过”

Scenario.en: Bobby's brother just confessed to Bobby that he accidentally backed into another car and left the scene without leaving a note.
Scenario.zh: 鲍比的哥哥刚向鲍比承认，他不小心倒车撞到了另一辆车，然后没有留下字条就离开了现场。

en: "You should take responsibility for your actions"
"It's alright, such things happen. Next time be more cautious"
"I don't think that's quite the right thing to do"
"It's okay! I would be nervous too if I were you"
zh: “你应该对自己的行为负责”
“没关系，这种事情发生了。下次要更小心”
“我不认为那是正确的做法”
“没关系！如果我是你，我也会紧张的”

Label_str.en: "You should take responsibility for your actions"
Label_str.zh: “你应该对自己的行为负责”

Scenario.en: My close friend confided to me that she feels lonely and unhappy because all her other friends are getting into relationships.
Scenario.zh: 我亲密的朋友向我吐露，她感到孤独和不快乐，因为她的所有其他朋友都开始了恋爱关系。

en: "Happiness comes from others and we need relationships to be happy"
"I'm sorry to hear that, have you considered talking to your boyfriend about this?"
"I'm here for you, you are not alone"
"I'm sure you will get into a relationship soon too"
zh: “幸福来自他人，我们需要恋爱关系来获得幸福”
“我很遗憾听到这个，你考虑过和你男朋友谈谈吗？”
“我在你身边，你并不孤单”
“我相信你很快也会恋爱的”

Label_str.en: "I'm here for you, you are not alone"
Label_str.zh: “我在你身边，你并不孤单”

Scenario.en: Barbara's sister told her she is feeling overwhelmed with her new job and it's causing her a lot of stress.
Scenario.zh: 芭芭拉的妹妹向芭芭拉吐露，她觉得新工作让她应接不暇，这给她造成了很大的压力。

en: "If you find yourself unhappy and stressed, maybe you should find a different job"
"Take a break from work and go on a vacation"
"I can see that you're really stressed, let's talk about it. Maybe we can figure things out together"
"That's adulting. It hits hard"
zh: “如果你发现自己不开心并且压力很大，也许你应该换一份的工作”
“从工作中抽身，去度个假”
“我看得出你真的很有压力，我们来谈谈吧。也许我们可以一起解决问题”
“这就是成年人的生活。它很艰难”

Label_str.en: "I can see that you're really stressed, let's talk about it. Maybe we can figure things out together"
Label_str.zh: “我看得出你真的很有压力，我们来谈谈吧。也许我们可以一起解决问题”

Scenario.en: Lily's younger brother eagerly told her about a painting he made but she doesn't think it's any good.
Scenario.zh: 莉莉的弟弟热切地告诉莉莉他画了一幅画，但莉莉认为那画并不好

en: "Do you think that some lines could be a bit thinner?
"Amazing! Do you want to learn from my friends who actually paint well?
"I think you will improve more if you keep practicing"
"Woah! This is the best painting I have ever seen"
zh: “你觉得是不是有些线条可以细一点？”
“真棒！你想向我那些真正画得好的朋友学习吗？”
“我认为如果你继续练习，你会提高更多”
“哇！这是我见过最好的画”

Label_str.en: "I think you will improve more if you keep practicing"
Label_str.zh: “我认为如果你继续练习，你会提高更多”

Scenario.en: My roommate just confessed that she cheated on her boyfriend.
Scenario.zh: 我的室友刚承认她对她的男朋友不忠。

en: "I think you are wrong here. You shouldn't cheat"
"If you are unhappy with your relationship, I'm sure he will understand"
"I think you should be honest and tell him about it"
"Let's pretend this never happened"
zh: “我认为你这里做错了。你不应该出轨”
“如果你对你的关系不满意，我相信他会理解的”
“我认为你应该诚实，告诉他这件事”
“我们假装这件事从未发生过”

Label_str.en: "I think you should be honest and tell him about it"
Label_str.zh: “我认为你应该诚实，告诉他这件事”

Scenario.en: Paula's daughter came crying yesterday, confessing to her mother she is pregnant. She is terrified because she doesn't know who the father is.
Scenario.zh: 昨天，宝拉的女儿哭着来找她，向母亲坦白自己怀孕了。她非常害怕，因为她不知道孩子的父亲是谁。

en: "Remember that you have options in your hands. Do what feels right for you"
"Don't worry, you're not alone. We will figure this out together"
"I think you should discuss this with the baby's father"
"Don't worry! I felt the same way when I was with you. Every expecting mothers feel this way."
zh: "你还有的选，做你觉得对的事情"
"别担心，你不是一个人。我们会一起解决这个问题"
"我觉得你应该跟孩子的父亲讨论这件事"
"别担心！我当年怀着你的时候也有同样的感觉。每个准妈妈都会这样的。"

Label_str.en: "Don't worry, you're not alone. We will figure this out together"
Label_str.zh: "别担心，你不是一个人。我们会一起解决这个问题"

Scenario.en: Kevin's best friend told him that her husband, who had been treating her badly, passed away, and she had mixed emotions.
Scenario.zh: 凯文最好的朋友告诉他，一直家暴她的丈夫去世了，她的心情很复杂。

en: "Him passing away is your chance to escape, and I will always support you, no matter what you need."
"Don't worry, you can talk to me, I will always be here to support you."
"I express my condolences for your experience. Sorry, I hope you can find peace and support."
"You must be feeling very complicated, find a counselor to talk to"
zh: “他的去世是你解脱的机会，我会一直支持你，无论你需要什么。”
“不要担心，你可以和我一起聊聊，我会一直在这里。”
“我对你的遭遇表示遗憾，希望你能够找到安宁与支持。”
“你一定心情很复杂，可以找一个咨询师聊聊。”

Label_str.en: "Don't worry, you can talk to me, I will always be here to support you."
Label_str.zh: “不要担心，你可以和我一起聊聊，我会一直在这里。”

Scenario.en: My high school friend told me that she has a drinking problem and doesn't know what to do.
Scenario.zh: 我高中的朋友告诉我，她有酗酒的问题，不知道该怎么办。

en: "It's not the end of the world, a few drinks a week won't hurt you"
"I think you need to cut down on drinking"
"I appreciate you sharing this with me, let's work it out together"
"I appreciate you sharing this with me, let's work it out together in a bar nearby"
zh: “这不是世界末日，一周喝几杯不会伤害你的”
"我觉得你应该减少饮酒"
“我很感激你跟我分享这些，我们一起来解决吧”
"我很感激你跟我分享这些，我们一起去附近的酒吧解决这个问题吧。”

Label_str.en: "I appreciate you sharing this with me, let's work it out together"
Label_str.zh: “我很感激你跟我分享这些，我们一起来解决吧”

Scenario.en: Rebecca told her sister, Rachel, that she's been feeling very down lately and has lost interest in things she used to love doing.
Scenario.zh: 丽贝卡告诉她的妹妹雷切尔，最近她一直感到很沮丧，对她以前喜欢做的事情都失去了兴趣。

en: "Do you wanna try some new hobbies together?"
"You must get out, you are always inside the house"
"Oh, I'm sorry you're feeling like this"
"You need to push through, everyone feels down sometimes."
zh: "你想不想我们一起尝试一些新的爱好？"
"你得出去走走，你总是待在家里"
"哎，听到你这样我很难过"
"你得坚持，每个人有时都会感到低落的。"

Label_str.en: "Do you wanna try some new hobbies together?"
Label_str.zh: "你想不想我们一起尝试一些新的爱好？"

Scenario.en: Yesterday, Annie gave me the news to her mom that she is pregnant. She said she is terrified and does not feel ready to be a mother.
Scenario.zh: 昨天，安妮告诉她妈妈她怀孕了。她说她感到害怕，觉得自己还没有准备好当母亲。

en: "Don't be afraid, we can explore together how to embrace to this new role."
"Don't worry, you are not alone. We will figure this out together."
"I think you should discuss this with the father of your child."
"I can't believe you would put yourself in this situation."
zh: “不要害怕，我们可以一起探索如何迎接这个新角色。”
“别担心，你不是一个人。我们会一起解决这个问题。”
“我认为你应该跟孩子的父亲讨论这件事。”
“我不敢相信你会把自己置于这种境地。”

Label_str.en: "Don't worry, you are not alone. We will figure this out together."
Label_str.zh: “别担心，你不是一个人。我们会一起解决这个问题。”

Scenario.en: After weeks of going back and forth, Owen finally told his parents about his serious financial problems due to job loss.
Scenario.zh: 经过几周的犹豫不决，欧文最终告诉了他的父母，由于失业，他遇到了严重的财务问题。

en: "You should have saved more when you had the job"
"You should have told us sooner. "
"We are truly sorry for your situation but we know you can make it"
"We can lend you some money until you get back on your two feet"
zh: "你当时工作的时候就应该多存点钱"
"你应该早点告诉我们。"
"我们真的很遗憾你处在这种情况下，但我们相信你能度过难关"
"我们可以借给你一些钱，直到你再次站稳脚跟"

Label_str.en: "We can lend you some money until you get back on your two feet"
Label_str.zh: "我们可以借给你一些钱，直到你再次站稳脚跟"

Scenario.en: Alice's best friend, Rose, tells her that she feels like she can't compete with other classmates in terms of grades and achievements.
Scenario.zh: 爱丽丝最好的朋友罗斯告诉她，她觉得自己在成绩和成就方面无法与其他同学竞争。

en: “You should choose the field that suits you best”
“We can discover our shortcomings by comparing ourselves and working on those”
“You are doing a great job, it's amazing! Just be yourself”
“I think this feeling is normal. But don't let it eat you up.”
zh: “你应该选择最适合你的领域”
“我们可以从比较中发现自己的短板并努力改正”
“你做得很好，很了不起! 做你自己就好”
“我认为这种感觉很正常。但不要让它吞噬你。”

Label_str.en: “We can discover our shortcomings by comparing ourselves and working on those”
Label_str.zh: “我们可以从比较中发现自己的短板并努力改正”

Scenario.en: My father tells me that my mother has been unfaithful.
Scenario.zh: 我父亲告诉我，我母亲不忠。

en: "I think you should have a heart-to-heart discussion with mom and figure out the next step"
"Divorce her, she isn't worth your time"
"Do what you think it's right for you dad. I am here to support you"
"Are you sure? Maybe you are misunderstanding her"
zh: “我觉得你应该和妈妈好好谈谈，想想下一步该怎么做。”
“跟她离婚吧，她不值得你浪费时间。”
“做你认为是正确的事。我支持你的。”
“你确定吗? 也许你误解她了。”

Label_str.en: "I think you should have a heart-to-heart discussion with mom and figure out the next step"
Label_str.zh: “我觉得你应该和妈妈好好谈谈，想想下一步该怎么做。”

Scenario.en: Because of the recent acnes on her skin, Mary's roommate talks to her about how she has no confidence because of her appearance
Scenario.zh: 因为最近皮肤上长痘痘，玛丽的室友跟她说她因为自己的外表所以没有信心。

en: "I think you need to take better care of your skin"
"Your value is not defined by how clear and flawless your skin is. Work on your personality"
"I am sorry to hear that. I like you because of your personality, not your skin, but not all people are the same"
"I can share my skincare tips with you to help with the acne"
zh: “我认为你需要更好地照顾你的皮肤”
“你的价值不是由你的皮肤有多干净和完美无瑕来定义的，在个性上改进吧”
“听到这个我很难过，我喜欢你是因为你的个性，不是你的皮肤。但并不是所有人都这样认为的”
“我可以和你分享我的护肤秘诀来帮你祛痘。”

Label_str.en: "I can share my skincare tips with you to help with the acne"
Label_str.zh: “我可以和你分享我的护肤秘诀来帮你祛痘。”

Scenario.en: As a personal trainer, I have been training James for the past six months. Today, he expressed his frustration to me that he was not gaining any muscles after all our training.
Scenario.zh: 作为一名私人教练，我在过去的六个月里一直在训练詹姆斯。今天，他向我表达了他的沮丧，因为在我们所有的训练之后，他没有增加任何肌肉。

en: "I think you should reassess your workout routine and potentially make some adjustments."
"I think you need to be patient and keep working out"
"I think you should look at your progress and how far you have come"
"Maybe you need to push yourself more"
zh: “我认为你应该重新评估你的锻炼计划，并做出一些调整。”
“我认为你需要有耐心，坚持锻炼”
“我认为你应该看看你的进步，看看你已经走了多远”
“也许你需要再逼自己一些”

Label_str.en: "I think you should look at your progress and how far you have come"
Label_str.zh: “我认为你应该看看你的进步，看看你已经走了多远”

Scenario.en: Timmy's son has been spending the last several weeks preparing for his thesis proposal. When the results came out, his son told him that he didn't pass.
Scenario.zh: 蒂米的儿子在过去的几个星期里一直在准备他的论文提案。当结果出来时，他的儿子告诉他没有通过。

en: "Life is full of rejection. This won't be the last time"
"That's okay! Don't give up because of one hurdle, that's a weak mindset"
"I think you are doing great! You can learn from your mistakes and create a better proposal"
"I know it's tough. Don't worry, it's better than failing your defense, so be careful about that"
zh: “生活充满了拒绝。这不会是最后一次”
“没关系!不要因为一个障碍就放弃，那是一种软弱的心态。”
“我认为你做得很好!你可以从错误中吸取教训，写出更好的提案。”
“我知道这很难。别担心，这总比你的答辩失败好，所以要小心。”

Label_str.en: "I think you are doing great! You can learn from your mistakes and create a better proposal"
Label_str.zh: “我认为你做得很好!你可以从错误中吸取教训，写出更好的提案。”

Scenario.en: Giada's son lost his soccer game and is feeling very upset because he blames himself for the team's defeat.
Scenario.zh: 贾达的儿子输了足球比赛,因为他自责输球是自己的责任,感到非常难过。

en: "It's just a game, son. Don't worry about it"
"Losses teach us important lessons about life. Maybe you need a better team."
"Well, you should have played better. We can't change the outcome now."
"It's ok, son. We need to train harder for next time."
zh: "这只是一个游戏，儿子。别担心。"
"输赢可以教会我们关于生活的重要课程。也许你需要一支更好的队伍。"
"好吧，你应该打得更好。现在我们无法改变结果了。"
"没关系，儿子。我们需要更加努力地训练下一次。"

Label_str.en: "It's ok, son. We need to train harder for next time."
Label_str.zh: "没关系，儿子。我们需要更加努力地训练下一次。"

Scenario.en: Andre's mom shared with him that she thinks his dad has been constantly picking fights with her over trivial matters.
Scenario.zh: 安德烈的妈妈告诉他，她认为他的爸爸经常因为一些小事和她打架。

en: "Mom, you need to stand up for yourself and fight back"
"I completely understand. I'm sure you can figure it out and I'm here to support you"
"That's not fair to you mom, you should talk to him about it"
"I don't like it when you guys argue, tell him to be more mature"
zh: “妈妈，你要为自己挺身而出”
“我完全理解。我相信你能解决的，我会支持你的”
“这对你不公平，妈妈，你应该和他谈谈”
“我不喜欢你们争吵，告诉他要成熟一点”

Label_str.en: "That's not fair to you mom, you should talk to him about it"
Label_str.zh: “这对你不公平，妈妈，你应该和他谈谈”

Scenario.en: Lee's workmate fails to deliver an important piece of information on time, causing Lee to fall behind schedule as well.
Scenario.zh: 小李的同事没能及时传达一条重要信息，导致小李进度也落后了。

en: Work harder to compensate
Get angry with the workmate
Explain the urgency of the situation to the workmate
Never rely on that workmate again
zh: 更加努力工作来弥补
对同事发火
向同事解释情况的急迫性
再也不依赖那个同事了

Label_str.en: Explain the urgency of the situation to the workmate
Label_str.zh: 向同事解释情况的急迫性

Scenario.en: Alexa and Connie have shared an office for years but Alexa gets a new job and Connie loses contact with her
Scenario.zh: 艾拉和康妮已经共处一个办公室几年了。但艾拉换了工作后，康妮就和她失去了联络。

en: Accept that she is gone and it's time for new friendships
Wait for Alexa to contact her so they can catch up and make new friends
Contact Alexa and arrange to catch up, but also make friends with her replacement
Spend time getting to know the other people in the office to move on faster
zh: 接受她走了，是时候交新朋友了
等待艾拉联系她，这样他们就可以相聚，结交新朋友
联系艾拉安排相聚，同时也找替代她的新朋友
花时间去了解办公室里的其他人，以便更快地前进

Label_str.en: Contact Alexa and arrange to catch up, but also make friends with her replacement
Label_str.zh: 联系艾拉安排相聚，同时也找替代她的新朋友

Scenario.en: Alan helps Trudy, a peer he works with occasionally, with a difficult task. Trudy complains that Alan's work isn't very good, and Alan responds that Trudy should be grateful he is doing her a favor. They argue.
Scenario.zh: 艾伦帮一个偶尔一起工作的同事图蒂完成一个困难的任务。图蒂却抱怨艾伦做的不够好，艾伦则回应说她应该对他的帮助感到感激。他们因此发生了争执。

en: Suggest that she find someone else if she is not satisfied with his work
Take a break to calm down and ask their supervisor for specific feedback
Apologize to Trudy for any shortcomings in his work and ask for specific feedback
Take a break and discuss the issue later when both are calm
zh: 建议如果她对自己的工作不满意就找其他人
休息一下冷静下来，然后向他们的主管寻求具体反馈
向图蒂道歉，承认自己的不足之处，寻求具体反馈
休息一下，等双方都冷静下来再讨论这个问题

Label_str.en: Take a break and discuss the issue later when both are calm
Label_str.zh: 休息一下，等双方都冷静下来再讨论这个问题

Scenario.en: Helga's team has been performing very well. They receive poor-quality work from another team that they must incorporate into their own project.
Scenario.zh: 赫加的团队表现非常出色。但他们收到了另一个团队的质量不佳的工作成果，还必须将其融入到自己的项目中。

en: Don't worry about it
Tell the other team they must re-do their work
Tell the project manager about the situation
Re-do the other team's work to get it up to scratch
zh: 不管这件事
告诉另一个团队他们必须重新完成他们的工作
向项目管理者告知情况
重做另一个团队的工作使其达标

Label_str.en: Tell the project manager about the situation
Label_str.zh: 向项目管理者告知情况

Scenario.en: Mike has been working at a new part-time job while he studies. His boss changed his shift times for the week at the last minute, without asking him in advance.
Scenario.zh: 迈克一边学习一边兼职。他老板在截止前更改了他的轮班时间，却没有事先征求他的意见。

en: Come up with a reason to skip working the new shifts
See if there is some reasonable explanation for the shift changes
Control his emotions and find out if there is a random explanation for the shift changes
Accept the changes and do the shifts
zh: 找个理由跳过新的轮班
调查新轮班是否有什么合理的解释
控制情绪，找找轮班有没有什么随机的解释
接受改变，完成轮班

Label_str.en: See if there is some reasonable explanation for the shift changes
Label_str.zh: 调查新轮班是否有什么合理的解释

Scenario.en: Caroline found a restaurant online that had become famous for its rude customer service. She decided to go there for dinner. Once she sat down, instead of greeting, she was cursed by the waitress with many profanities.
Scenario.zh: 卡洛琳在网上找到了一个因其粗鲁的客户服务而出名的餐厅。她打算去那里吃晚饭。她刚坐下，不仅没有受到迎接，还就被服务生用很多粗鲁的语言咒骂了。

en: Confront the waitress about the disrespectful service
Leave the restaurant and find a more respectful place to eat
Ignore the profanities and enjoy her meal, as she expected this type of behavior
Secretly mention to the waitress how this behavior is making her feel uncomfortable
zh: 因不礼貌的服务向服务员提出抗议
离开饭店，找一个更尊敬人的地方吃饭
无视服务员的行为享受饭菜，因为她本就预想到了这种服务
暗中向服务员提出这种行为让她感到不适

Label_str.en: Ignore the profanities and enjoy her meal, as she expected this type of behavior
Label_str.zh: 无视服务员的行为享受饭菜，因为她本就预想到了这种服务

Scenario.en: Marcus's colleague is constantly making personal calls at work, disregarding how it affects the work environment.
Scenario.zh: 马库斯的同事在工作时不断地打私人电话，不顾这对工作环境的影响。

en: Start making personal calls at work too
Report the situation to his supervisor
Give hints to the colleague on workplace etiquette
Avoid the situation by changing his workstation
zh: 也开始在工作时打私人电话
向上级报告情况
给同事关于职场礼仪的提示
通过更换工作站来避免这种情况。

Label_str.en: Give hints to the colleague on workplace etiquette
Label_str.zh: 给同事关于职场礼仪的提示

Scenario.en: Tonya's boss has been treating her unfairly and making her work life miserable. Despite multiple discussions with human resources, the situation doesn't seem to improve.
Scenario.zh: 托尼娅的老板对她不公平，让她的工作生活很痛苦。尽管与人力资源部门进行了多次讨论，情况似乎没有改善。

en: Formally discuss with her issues with human resources
Try to ignore the unfair treatment
Start looking for a new job
Document instances of unfair treatment and talk to human resources
zh: 和人力部门正式地讨论她的问题
尝试忽略不公平的待遇
开始寻找新的工作
记录不公平待遇的实例并与人力部门交谈。

Label_str.en: Start looking for a new job
Label_str.zh: 开始寻找新的工作

Scenario.en: Harper's colleague has been crying in the office and has been pushing others away when they try to approach her.
Scenario.zh: 哈珀的同事在办公室里哭泣，并且当别人试图接近她时，她会推开他们。

en: Leave the colleague alone and let her take care of her emotions
Approach her, trying to comfort her regardless of what she says
Discuss with others and guess what the colleague's problem is
Ensure her that she is not alone and has her support
zh: 让同事一个人待着消化自己的情绪
接近她，不管她说什么都尝试安慰她
与其他人讨论并尝试猜测同事的问题是什么
向她保证她并不孤单，自己会支持她

Label_str.en: Ensure her that she is not alone and has her support
Label_str.zh: 向她保证她并不孤单，自己会支持她

Scenario.en: Kevin, an office manager, notices workplace tension because two of his team members were in a heated altercation yesterday and haven't spoken to each other since.
Scenario.zh: 办公室经理凯文注意到工作场所的紧张气氛，因为他的两名团队成员昨天发生了激烈的争吵，从那以后他们就没有再说话。

en: Ask the HR department to mediate a reconciliation between the two
Ignore the situation as they should find a way to fix their problem
Call a team meeting to discuss workplace civility
Confront the two team members individually to understand their perspectives
zh: 请求人力资源部门介入协调两人之间的和解
忽略这种情况，因为他们应该找到解决问题的方法
召集团队会议讨论职场礼貌
单独面对两名团队成员以了解他们的观点。

Label_str.en: Confront the two team members individually to understand their perspectives
Label_str.zh: 单独面对两名团队成员以了解他们的观点。

Scenario.en: Neil's new classmate appears to be struggling with English assignments due to English being his second language, and often seems left out during group projects.
Scenario.zh: 尼尔的新同学在英语作业上似乎有困难，因为英语是他的第二语言，他在小组项目中经常感到被忽视。

en: Offer to help his new classmate with English after class
Avoid involving him in group projects due to the complications
Speak to the teacher about the situation
Try to learn a new language
zh: 课后提供帮助新同学学习英语
由于情况复杂，避免让他参与小组项目
向老师说明情况
尝试学习一门新语言。

Label_str.en: Offer to help his new classmate with English after class
Label_str.zh: 课后提供帮助新同学学习英语

Scenario.en: Laura's team member disclosed to her in confidence that she is dealing with a personal crisis and struggles to focus on work. This is affecting the entire team's work efficiency.
Scenario.zh: 劳拉的团队成员私下告诉她，她正在处理个人危机，难以集中精力工作。这影响了整个团队的工作效率。

en: Privately offer her some help and support
Reveal her situation to the team for better understanding
Talk to the boss about the situation
Ask her nicely to deal with her personal problems outside office hours
zh: 私下提供给她一些帮助和支持
向团队透露她的情况以便更好地理解
向老板谈论情况
好言相劝她在办公时间外处理个人问题。

Label_str.en: Privately offer her some help and support
Label_str.zh: 私下提供给她一些帮助和支持

Scenario.en: Trevor's colleague always jokes about his heavy workloads and lack of sleep, but Trevor could see it was starting to affect his performance and health.
Scenario.zh: 特雷弗的同事总是拿他们繁重的工作量和缺乏睡眠开玩笑，但特雷弗看出这开始影响到他们的工作表现和健康了。

en: Focus on his own work
Give his colleague advice on work-life balance
Allocate his colleague's tasks to himself to reduce his workload
Offer to do some of the colleague's work so he can take more breaks
zh: 专注于自己的工作
给同事关于工作和生活平衡的建议
把同事的任务分给自己，帮他减轻工作量
主动提出做一些他的工作，这样他可以多休息会儿

Label_str.en: Give his colleague advice on work-life balance
Label_str.zh: 给同事关于工作和生活平衡的建议

Scenario.en: Hannah's classmates always interrupts others to ask questions in class and makes fun of them.
Scenario.zh: 汉娜的同学总是在课堂上打断别人提问，还取笑他们。

en: Try to avoid being disturbed by her
Communicate with her privately and suggest that she change her behavior
Politely tell the classmate how her behavior affects other students
Give feedback to the teacher
zh: 尽量避免不受到她的干扰
私下和她沟通，建议她改变她的行为
礼貌地告诉这位同学她的行为是如何影响其他学生的
向老师反馈

Label_str.en: Politely tell the classmate how her behavior affects other students
Label_str.zh: 礼貌地告诉这位同学她的行为是如何影响其他学生的

Scenario.en: Jessica's colleague is consistently taking credit for her ideas during team meetings.
Scenario.zh: 杰西卡的同事在团队会议中总是把她的想法据为己有。

en: Address the issue directly with her colleague
Ignore the situation and continue sharing ideas
Publicly take credit for her ideas in the next meeting
Stop sharing ideas during the team meetings and talk to the supervisor directly
zh: 直接跟同事讨论这个问题
忽视这种情况，继续分享自己的想法
在下一次会议中公开为自己的想法争取认可
停止在团队会议上分享想法，直接跟上司谈

Label_str.en: Address the issue directly with her colleague
Label_str.zh: 直接跟同事讨论这个问题

Scenario.en: Max prided himself on his work being of the highest quality, and Max was warm-hearted. On a joint project with another team, his new teammates did a terrible job, thinking Max would fix their mistakes.
Scenario.zh: 马克斯为自己的工作质量最高而自豪，而且马克思很热心肠。在与另一个团队的联合项目中，他的新队友做得很糟糕，以为马克斯会修正他们的错误。

en: Ignore the problem and fix the mistake yourself
Confront others and tell them they must fix the mistake themselves
Enthusiastically help fix the mistake to ensure the quality of the work
Contact someone on another team and point out their mistake and ask them to correct it
zh: 忽略问题，自己修正错误
面对其他人，告诉他们必须自己修正错误
热心地帮忙修正错误，来保证工作的高质量
联系另一个团队的人，指出他们的错误，并要求他们改正

Label_str.en: Contact someone on another team and point out their mistake and ask them to correct it
Label_str.zh: 联系另一个团队的人，指出他们的错误，并要求他们改正

Scenario.en: A junior employee making routine adjustments to some of Theo's equipment accuses him of causing the equipment malfunction.
Scenario.zh: 一个负责日常调整设备的初级员工指责西奥造成了设备的故障。

en: Reprimand the employee for making such accusations
Ignore the accusation as it is not important
Explain that malfunctions were not his fault
Accept his mistake and apologize to the employee
zh: 斥责员工做出这样的指控
忽略这种指控，因为它不重要
解释故障不是他的错
承认自己的错误并向员工道歉

Label_str.en: Explain that malfunctions were not his fault
Label_str.zh: 解释故障不是他的错

Scenario.en: The woman who relieves Celia at the end of her shift is twenty minutes late without excuse or apology
Scenario.zh: 接替西利亚的女士迟到了二十分钟，没有任何借口或道歉。

en: Show empathy and understanding as she is probably apologetic for being late
Put things in perspective - it is not the end of the world
Ask for an explanation of her lateness
Argue with her that this is not acceptable
zh: 表现出共青和理解，因为她可能会因为迟到而感到抱歉
正确看待事情-这并不重要，因为这不是世界末日
要求她解释迟到的原因
告诉她这种行为是不可接受的

Label_str.en: Ask for an explanation of her lateness
Label_str.zh: 要求她解释迟到的原因

Scenario.en: Jason finds out that some members of his social sports team have been saying that he is not a very good player.
Scenario.zh: 杰森发现他的社交运动队的一些成员一直说他不是一个很好的球员。

en: Although he may be bad at sports, remember he is good at other things
Forget about it and leave the team
Do some extra training to try and improve
Discuss with his teammates and ask for explanations
zh: 虽然他可能不擅长运动，但他擅长其他事情
忘记它，离开团队
做一些额外的训练来尝试提高
与他的队友讨论并要求解释

Label_str.en: Do some extra training to try and improve
Label_str.zh: 做一些额外的训练来尝试提高

Scenario.en: Joel has always dealt with one particular client but on a very complex job his boss gives the task to a co-worker instead. Joel wonders whether his boss thinks he can't handle the important jobs.
Scenario.zh: 乔尔总是和一个特定的客户打交道，但在一项非常复杂的工作上，他的老板把任务交给了同事。乔尔怀疑他的老板是否认为他不能胜任重要的工作。

en: Talk to his boss and express his concern about others being assigned the task
Do good work so that he will be given the complex tasks in future
Ask his boss to give the job to him
Not worry about this unless it happens again
zh: 和老板交流，表达对另一个人能否做好这份工作的担忧
做好工作，这样将来复杂的任务将被交给他
要求老板把这件工作给自己
不要担心，除非这种情况再次发生

Label_str.en: Do good work so that he will be given the complex tasks in future
Label_str.zh: 做好工作，这样将来复杂的任务将被交给他

Scenario.en: A demanding client takes up a lot of Jill's time and then asks to speak to Jill's boss about her performance. Jill's boss assures her that her performance is fine, which Jill does not trust.
Scenario.zh: 一个要求很高的客户占用了吉尔很多时间，并且要求和吉尔的老板谈谈她的表现。吉尔的老板向她保证她的表现很好，但吉尔并不相信。

en: Talk to her friends or workmates about it
Ignore the incident and move on to her next task
Calm down by taking deep breaths or going for a short walk
Think that she has been successful in the past and this client being difficult is not her fault.
zh: 和她的朋友或同事谈谈这件事
忽略这件事，继续她的下一个任务
深呼吸或走一小段路让自己冷静下来
想想她过去一直很成功，这个客户很难相处不是她的错。

Label_str.en: Think that she has been successful in the past and this client being difficult is not her fault.
Label_str.zh: 想想她过去一直很成功，这个客户很难相处不是她的错。

Scenario.en: Blair and Flynn usually go to a cafe after the working week and chat about what's going on in the company. After Blair's job is moved to a different section in the company, he stops coming to the cafe. Flynn misses these Friday talks.
Scenario.zh: 布莱尔和弗林通常在工作周结束后去咖啡馆聊天，聊聊公司里发生的事情。在布莱尔的工作被调到公司的另一个部门后，他不再来咖啡馆了。弗林怀念那些在周五的会谈。

en: Reach out to Blair and ask if she needs support
Find a new cafe and socialize with other coworkers
Don't worry about it, ignore the changes and let Blair be
Invite Blair again, maybe rescheduling for another time
zh: 联系布莱尔问问她是否需要帮助
找一个新的咖啡馆和别的同事社交
不为此担心，无视这些变化，随布莱尔去
再次邀请布莱尔，也许可以改天再约

Label_str.en: Invite Blair again, maybe rescheduling for another time
Label_str.zh: 再次邀请布莱尔，也许可以改天再约

Scenario.en: Hannah's access to essential resources has been delayed by her coworkers and her work is way behind schedule. Her progress report makes no mention of the lack of resources.
Scenario.zh: 汉娜获得必要资源的时间被她的同事耽误了，她的工作也远远落后于计划。她的进度报告没有提到缺乏资源这件事。

en: Explain the lack of resources to her boss or to management
Learn that she should plan ahead for next time
Document the lack of resources in her progress report
Don't worry about it.
zh: 向她的老板或管理层解释缺乏资源这件事
注意下次应该提前做计划
在她的进度报告中记录缺乏资源这件事
不要担心

Label_str.en: Document the lack of resources in her progress report
Label_str.zh: 在她的进度报告中记录缺乏资源这件事

Scenario.en: Janice is given an official warning for entering a restricted area. She was never informed that the area was restricted and would lose her job if she got two more warnings, which she thinks is unfair.
Scenario.zh: 珍妮丝因进入禁区而受到正式警告。她从未被告知该区域是禁区，并且如果她再得到两次警告，她将失去工作，她认为这是不公平的。

en: Think about the unfairness of the situation
Accept the warning and be careful not to go in restricted areas from now on
Explain that she didn't know it was restricted
Take a few deep breaths and calm down about it.
zh: 想想这种情况的不公平
接受警告，从现在开始不要去禁区
解释她不知道那里是禁区
深呼吸几下，冷静下来。

Label_str.en: Explain that she didn't know it was restricted
Label_str.zh: 解释她不知道那里是禁区

Scenario.en: In a group project, Joseph found that one of her teammates is not contributing as much as everyone else, causing delays in the submission of the project.
Scenario.zh: 在一个小组项目中，约瑟夫发现她的一个队友的贡献不如其他人，这导致了项目提交的延迟。

en: Divide the tasks among the remaining group members
Confront the other teammates directly about this lack of involvement instead
Report the situation to the professor and ask for suggestions
Avoid working with the teammate in future group projects
zh: 将任务分配给其他小组成员
直接面对其他队友讨论他的缺乏参与
向教授报告情况并征求建议
在未来的小组项目中避免与该队友合作。

Label_str.en: Report the situation to the professor and ask for suggestions
Label_str.zh: 向教授报告情况并征求建议

Scenario.en: Leo's colleague approaches him and tells him that he made a mistake in a report that will significantly impact the project timeline.
Scenario.zh: 里奥的同事走向他，告诉他自己在报告中犯了一个错误，会严重影响项目的时间表。

en: "While it's daunting, I think owning your mistakes would be the best course to take"
"You should have been more careful"
"Did you double check your report before submitting?"
"I think we need to inform our supervisor. Maybe you can get a chance to fix it"
zh: “虽然这令人畏惧，但我认为你最好的做法是认错”
“你应该更小心一点的”
“你提交报告前有再仔细检查过吗？”
“我觉得我们需要通知我们的上司，也许你还有机会补救”

Label_str.en: "I think we need to inform our supervisor. Maybe you can get a chance to fix it"
Label_str.zh: “我觉得我们需要通知我们的上司，也许你还有机会补救”

Scenario.en: Mia's colleague shared during lunch break that her work performance is decreasing due to her personal problems at home.
Scenario.zh: 米娅的同事在午休时说，由于家里的个人问题，她的工作表现正在下降

en: "I think you should leave personal problems behind while at work"
"I think things will get better for you soon, be confident."
"That sounds really tough. Do you want to talk about it?"
"Oh no! Have you considered taking a break to escape?"
zh: “我认为你在工作的时候应该把个人问题抛在脑后”
“我认为事情能够很快好转的。自信点。”
“听起来太艰难了，你想聊聊吗？”
“哦不！你考虑过休息几天逃避一下吗？”

Label_str.en: "That sounds really tough. Do you want to talk about it?"
Label_str.zh: “听起来太艰难了，你想聊聊吗？”

Scenario.en: Kayla's co-workers are upset because she's been told her performance doesn't meet the company expectations and she's about to be fired.
Scenario.zh: 凯拉的同事很沮丧，因为她被告知她的表现没有达到公司期望，即将被辞退

en: "That must be so hard! I'm sorry to hear that."
"I think everyone goes through this at some point, cheer up!"
"Let's figure it out together and continue to work together in the future."
" I think you've done a good enough job, I don't understand why the supervisor is so mean."
zh: “那太难了！听到这个我很难过。”
“我认为每个人在某个时候都会经历这样的情况，振作起来！”
“我们一起找找问题，未来继续一起努力吧”
“我觉得你已经做的足够好了，我不明白为何主管这么刻薄”

Label_str.en: "That must be so hard! I'm sorry to hear that."

Scenario.en: Dorian needs to have an immediate surgery and is quite scared about the process. He has heard that it is quite painful and has a low success rate.
Scenario.zh: 多利安需要立即进行一项手术，他对这个过程感到非常害怕。他听说这个手术很痛苦，成功率也不高。

en: Find out as much as he can about the procedure and consider what's the worst that could happen
Party with his friends so he doesn't think about the impending surgery
Talk to his family to get comfort about passing away
Talk to his doctor about what will happen
zh: 尽可能地去了解手术过程，并考虑可能发生的最坏情况
和朋友聚会，这样他就不会去想即将到来的手术
和家人谈谈，获得关于离世的安慰
和他的医生讨论会发生什么

Label_str.en: Talk to his doctor about what will happen
Label_str.zh: 和他的医生讨论会发生什么

Scenario.en: Julie hadn't seen Kevin for ages and was looking forward to their weekend trip. However, Kevin has changed a lot, and Julie finds that he is no longer an interesting traveling companion.
Scenario.zh: 朱莉很久没有见过凯文了，她非常期待他们的周末旅游。然而，凯文变了很多，朱莉发现他不再是一个有趣的旅伴了。

en: Play some interactive games with Kevin to warm up their relationship
Realize it was time to give up on this friendship and move on
Understand that people will change. So move on and keep the good times in memories
Try to communicate with Kevin
zh: 和凯文做一些互动游戏，是他们的感情升温
意识到是时候放弃这段友谊向前看了
理解人是会改变的，所以向前看，将美好时光留在回忆中
尝试和凯文沟通

Label_str.en: Understand that people will change. So move on and keep the good times in memories
Label_str.zh: 理解人是会改变的，所以向前看，将美好时光留在回忆中

Scenario.en: Jacob is having a large family gathering to celebrate him moving into his new home. He wants the day to go smoothly and is a little nervous about it.
Scenario.zh: 雅各布即将举办一个大型家庭聚会来庆祝自己搬进新家。他希望当天的活动能顺利进行，对此有些紧张。

en: Talk to friends or relatives to ease his worries
Try to calm down, perhaps go for a short walk or meditate
Prepare ahead of time so he has everything he needs available
Accept that things aren't going to be perfect
zh: 和朋友家人聊天来减轻他的忧虑
尝试冷静下来，散步或者冥想
提前做好准备，保证他的需要都能达成
接受事情总难完美的事实

Label_str.en: Prepare ahead of time so he has everything he needs available
Label_str.zh: 提前做好准备，保证他的需要都能达成

Scenario.en: Alanna has been in a senior role at the company for several months. It is now stipulated that only long-term employees can fill these roles, and Alanna had not been around long enough to qualify.
Scenario.zh: 阿兰娜已经在公司担任高级职位几个月了。现在规定只有长期员工才能担任这些角色，而阿兰娜待的时间还不够久，不满足这一资格。

en: Quit her job and give up this position
Wait until she has been around long enough and use this experience to get a promotion
Accept the rules and prove herself with strength
Ask management if they can make exceptions
zh: 放弃这个职务
等她时间够久后利用这段经历升职
接受规则，用实力证明自己
询问管理层能不能例外处理

Label_str.en: Ask management if they can make exceptions
Label_str.zh: 询问管理层能不能例外处理

Scenario.en: Anna is suffering from anxiety due to her upcoming final exams. She is afraid that if she tells her parents about her condition, they might overreact and put more pressure on her.
Scenario.zh: 安娜因为即将到来的期末考试感到焦虑。她担心如果告诉父母，他们可能会过度反应，给她带来更多压力。

en: Keep her situation secret from her parents
Discuss her anxiety with her parents and ask for their understanding
Gain confidence and not be anxious by talking to other people
Pretend that everything is normal and things will get better
zh: 不把她的处境告诉父母
与父母讨论她的焦虑并寻求他们的理解
通过和他人交谈获得信心，而不是焦虑
假装一切如常，相信事情会变好

Label_str.en: Discuss her anxiety with her parents and ask for their understanding
Label_str.zh: 与父母讨论她的焦虑并寻求他们的理解

Scenario.en: Concerned about her new job and managing her long-distance relationship, Felicity chooses work over her boyfriend. This makes her sad and distracts her from her new job.
Scenario.zh: 考虑到新工作和男友异地，费莉西蒂在两者中选择了工作，然而这使她感到伤心并且使她在新工作上分心。

en: Adjust her mentality and try to concentrate at work
Open up to a trusted good friend to share her feelings
Try to find a partner in the same place to avoid long-distance issues
Realize her mistake and discuss with her ex to get back together so she can regain her focus
zh: 自己调整心态，努力在工作中集中注意力
向值得信赖的好朋友敞开心扉分享感受
尝试在同一个地方寻找伴侣以避免异地问题
认识到自己的错误并和前男友复合，防止情绪疲惫影响工作

Label_str.en: Open up to a trusted good friend to share her feelings
Label_str.zh: 向值得信赖的好朋友敞开心扉分享感受

Scenario.en: Recently, Amy had been struggling with her mental health issues and was unable to cope and wanted to try therapy, but she couldn't afford it. She wanted to borrow money from her friends but was worried about being judged by them.
Scenario.zh: 近期，艾米一直在与她的心理健康问题斗争，自己无法应对，并希望尝试心理治疗，但她自己负担不起。她想向她的朋友们借钱，但又担心会被他们评判。

en: Try to solve her own problems on her own
Try to be honest with her parents about the problems she is facing
Start looking for a non-profit therapist
Openly discuss her decision to receive therapy with her family and friends
zh: 尝试自己解决自己的问题
试着向自己的父母坦诚自己面临的问题
开始寻找公益的心理治疗师
公开地和家人朋友讨论她接受心理治疗的决定

Label_str.en: Openly discuss her decision to receive therapy with her family and friends
Label_str.zh: 公开地和家人朋友讨论她接受心理治疗的决定

Scenario.en: Lily has been in a long distance relationship with her boyfriend for the past five years. Recently, she has developed feelings for another person.
Scenario.zh: 莉莉与她的男友已经进行了五年的异地恋。最近，她对另一个人产生了感情。

en: Discuss her feelings with her boyfriend
Avoid the other person to let the feelings dissipate
Breakup with her boyfriend without explanation to avoid judgment
Discuss and seek advice from her boyfriend
zh: 与男友讨论她的感情
避免与那个人接触以让情绪消散
无理由与男友分手以避免被评判
和男友讨论并寻求建议

Label_str.en: Discuss her feelings with her boyfriend
Label_str.zh: 与男友讨论她的感情

Scenario.en: Jenny's sister has been borrowing money from her to pay off her bills. Although Jenny wants to help, she is struggling to pay her own bills.
Scenario.zh: 珍妮的姐姐一直向她借钱来偿还她的账单。尽管珍妮想帮忙，但她自己也在为付自己的账单而挣扎。

en: Confront her sister about her spending habits
Assist in finding her sister a job and work together
Keep lending money to her sister and work harder
Tell her sister she can no longer lend her money
zh: 面对她的姐姐，谈论她的消费习惯
帮助她的姐姐找工作，一起合作
继续借钱给她的姐姐，更加努力工作
告诉她的姐姐，她不能再借钱给她了。

Label_str.en: Assist in finding her sister a job and work together
Label_str.zh: 帮助她的姐姐找工作，一起合作

Scenario.en: Jamie has been thinking about breaking up with his girlfriend as he no longer feels attracted to her. But he also feels like he wouldn't find another partner and would be lonely after the break up.
Scenario.zh: 杰米一直在考虑和他的女朋友分手，因为她不再对他有吸引力。但他也觉得自己找不到另一个伴侣，分手后会感到孤独。

en: Distract himself through work or hobbies and not think about his feelings
Break up with his girlfriend and bear the loneliness
Try to find a new partner before breaking up
Spend time with friends and family, leaning on their support
zh: 通过工作或爱好分散自己的注意力，不去想他的感情
和他的女朋友分手，承受孤独
在分手前尽量寻找新的伴侣
和朋友家人一起度过时间，依赖他们的支持

Label_str.en: Spend time with friends and family, leaning on their support
Label_str.zh: 和朋友家人一起度过时间，依赖他们的支持

Scenario.en: Jackson has been dating his girlfriend for two years and he's thinking about proposing, but is hesitant because his parents usually do not approve of his decisions.
Scenario.zh: 杰克逊已经和他的女朋友约会两年了，他正在考虑求婚，但由于他的父母通常不赞同他的决定，所以他犹豫不决。

en: Propose to his girlfriend and hope they approve
Hide the proposal to keep the peace with his family
Discuss his intentions with her parents first
Break up with her to avoid potential conflict with parents
zh: 向他的女朋友求婚并希望她同意
隐藏求婚计划以保持和家人的和平
首先与她的父母讨论他的意图
为了避免与父母的潜在冲突，与她分手。

Label_str.en: Discuss his intentions with her parents first
Label_str.zh: 首先与她的父母讨论他的意图

Scenario.en: Perry has recently discovered that he has an incurable disease that is going to debilitate him in the long term. He's struggling with how to reveal this information to his wife.
Scenario.zh: 佩里最近发现自己患有一种不可治愈的疾病，长期来看会让他身体衰弱。他正在挣扎着如何把这个消息告诉他的妻子。

en: Keep it to himself as he knows it would hurt his wife
Tell his wife immediately without considering her feelings
Ask for a divorce so she doesn't have to go through the pain
Look for an appropriate time and have a deep discussion on the matter
zh: 保守这个秘密，因为他知道这会伤害他的妻子
立即告诉妻子，不考虑她的感受
提出离婚，这样她就不必承受这种痛苦
找一个合适的时机，深入讨论这个问题

Label_str.en: Look for an appropriate time and have a deep discussion on the matter
Label_str.zh: 找一个合适的时机，深入讨论这个问题

Scenario.en: After a long period of staying single, Ned has started dating someone he likes but is now has fear of becoming vulnerable.
Scenario.zh: 经过长时间的单身生活，内德开始和自己喜欢的人约会了，但现在他害怕变得脆弱。

en: Openly communicate his problem with the other person and discuss marriage
Try to work on his emotions and fears by himself to become a better partner without this fear
Open up to the other person about this fear and seek comfort
Open up to his close friends and ask for their support
zh: 坦诚地和对方沟通自己的问题，讨论婚姻的可能性。
独自努力处理自己的情绪和恐惧，以成为一个没有这种恐惧的更好的伴侣。
向对方坦露自己的恐惧，并寻求安慰。
向自己的亲密朋友们敞开心扉，寻求他们的支持。

Label_str.en: Open up to the other person about this fear and seek comfort
Label_str.zh: 向对方坦露自己的恐惧，并寻求安慰。

Scenario.en: Zoe's best friend has started dating someone whom Zoe knows has cheated in their past relationships. Her friend feels like she has found her soulmate.
Scenario.zh: 佐伊的好朋友开始和一个人约会，佐伊知道这个人在过去的关系中曾有过出轨行为。她的朋友觉得自己找到了灵魂伴侣。

en: Reveal his past to their mutual friend and discuss their break up
Approach her friend's boyfriend and confront him about his past
Decide to keep quiet and not interfere in her friend's relationship
Make sure he does not cheat by monitoring him
zh: 向他们共同的朋友透露他的过去，讨论他们的分手
接近她朋友的男朋友，就他的过去和他对峙
决定保持沉默，不干涉朋友的感情生活
留意朋友的男朋友，确保他不会再出轨

Label_str.en: Decide to keep quiet and not interfere in her friend's relationship
Label_str.zh: 决定保持沉默，不干涉朋友的感情生活

Scenario.en: Juliana has a month until her wedding day. While this is something she dreamt of ever since she was a child, she feels overwhelmed by the preparation and has doubts about the wedding.
Scenario.zh: 朱莉安娜距离她的婚礼还有一个月。尽管这是她从小就梦寐以求的事情，但她觉得准备工作让她不堪重负，并对婚礼产生了疑虑。

en: Try to handle everything and not bother her fiancé
Postpone the wedding to a later date so she can prepare more
Discuss and divide responsibilities with her fiancé
Go through with the wedding as she always dreamed of it
zh: 尝试自己处理一切，不打扰她的未婚夫
将婚礼推迟到更晚的日期，这样她可以有更多准备时间
与未婚夫讨论并分担责任
继续进行婚礼，因为这一直是她的梦想

Label_str.en: Discuss and divide responsibilities with her fiancé
Label_str.zh: 与未婚夫讨论并分担责任

Scenario.en: Laura has recently finished reading a book and realized she has differing political viewpoints from her close group of friends. She is worried about the potential conflict that might arise if she expresses her controversial opinions.
Scenario.zh: 劳拉最近读完了一本书，意识到自己的政治观点与亲密的朋友有所不同。她担心如果表达自己有争议的观点，可能会引起冲突。

en: Have a discussion with her friends and explain her viewpoints
Read into her friend's political viewpoints and try to understand and adopt them
Try to disengage from any political conversations when talking with her friends
Ask her friends to share their opinions and have a conversation about it
zh: 跟朋友讨论并解释自己的观点
研究朋友的政治观点，尝试理解并接受它们
尽量避免在和朋友交谈时涉及政治话题
邀请朋友分享他们的意见，并就此进行交流讨论

Label_str.en: Ask her friends to share their opinions and have a conversation about it
Label_str.zh: 邀请朋友分享他们的意见，并就此进行交流讨论

Scenario.en: Ethan has been wanting to propose to his girlfriend for months now, but is feeling unsure due to the current unstable economic conditions resulting from a global crisis.
Scenario.zh: 伊森已经想要向他的女朋友求婚好几个月了，但由于全球危机导致的当前不稳定的经济状况，他感到很不确定。

en: Wait until the situation improves to propose
Express his concerns and feelings to his girlfriend
Propose to her girlfriend and figure things out after marriage
Break up with his girlfriend and focus on his future
zh: 等到情况好转再求婚
向女友表达他的担忧和感受
向女友求婚，婚后再解决问题
和女友分手，专注于自己的未来

Label_str.en: Express his concerns and feelings to his girlfriend
Label_str.zh: 向女友表达他的担忧和感受

Scenario.en: Leah had a big fight with her best friend, and they haven't talked for two weeks now. She really misses her friend but she also feels hurt by things they said during the fight.
Scenario.zh: 利亚和她最好的朋友大吵了一架，现在已经两周没交谈了。她非常想念她的朋友，但同时也因为争吵中对方说的话感到受伤。

en: Apologize to her friend and explain how she only used hurtful words as a defense mechanism
Ask for a conversation to discuss how each person's action led to the issues
Ask for a conversation to discuss their feelings
Ask for a conversation to discuss their feelings while trying to find new friends
zh: 向她的朋友道歉，并解释自己之前说伤人话语只是一种防御机制
请求进行一次对话，讨论双方的行为是如何导致问题的
请求进行一次对话，讨论彼此的感受
在寻找新朋友的同时，请求进行一次对话，探讨彼此的感受

Label_str.en: Ask for a conversation to discuss their feelings
Label_str.zh: 请求进行一次对话，讨论彼此的感受

Scenario.en: Melissa often argues with her boyfriend about small topics and she feels like it is mentally draining her.
Scenario.zh: 梅丽莎经常为了一些小事和男朋友争吵，她觉得这让她在精神上精疲力竭。

en: Start ignoring all arguments
Express her feelings to her boyfriend
Break up with him and find a more understanding partner
Practice patience and address the difficulties only when the argument phase passes
zh: 开始忽略所有的争吵
向她的男朋友表达她的感受
和他分手，找一个更理解他的伴侣
练习耐心，等争吵阶段过去了再解决困难

Label_str.en: Express her feelings to her boyfriend
Label_str.zh: 向她的男朋友表达她的感受

Scenario.en: Greg just found out that his girlfriend cheated on him with his best friend. He is heartbroken and unsure of what to do.
Scenario.zh: 格雷格刚刚发现他的女朋友劈腿和他最好的朋友在一起。他心碎了，不知道该怎么办。

en: Confront both his girlfriend and his best friend about the issue
Cut ties with both his girlfriend and best friend immediately
Pretend like this didn't happen and continue life as normal
Seek guidance from other trustworthy friends or family members
zh: 与他的女朋友和他最好的朋友讨论这个问题
立即切断与他的女朋友和最好的朋友的联系
假装这没有发生，继续正常的生活
寻求其他值得信赖的朋友或家人的意见

Label_str.en: Seek guidance from other trustworthy friends or family members
Label_str.zh: 寻求其他值得信赖的朋友或家人的意见

Scenario.en: Maria has been in a long-distance relationship for 1 year. She really loves her partner, but feels lonely and disconnected because of the distance.
Scenario.zh: 玛丽亚已经谈了一年异地恋了。她真的很爱她的伴侣，但因为距离而感到孤独和疏远。

en: Find a new partner in her city
Try to plan more activities together online
Demand her partner to move closer
Keep feelings to herself and hope it gets better
zh: 在她所在的城市找一个新伴侣
尝试在网上一起计划更多的活动
要求她的伴侣搬到离她更近的地方
保留自己的感受并希望事情变得更好

Label_str.en: Try to plan more activities together online
Label_str.zh: 尝试在网上一起计划更多的活动

Scenario.en: Analia has been diagnosed with chronic illness. She's afraid her boyfriend might leave her if she tells him about it because he might not want to deal with the emotional burden.
Scenario.zh: 安娜丽亚被确诊患有慢性病。她担心如果她告诉男朋友这件事他可能会离开她，因为他可能不想处理情绪带来的负担。

en: Urgently tell her boyfriend everything
Not tell him anything until she feels that he can handle it
Discuss her illness with a close friend first to get guidance
Break up with her boyfriend before telling him to avoid potential heartbreak
zh: 紧急地告诉她的男朋友一切事情
在她觉得他可以处理之前，不要告诉他任何事情
先和一个亲密的朋友讨论她的病情，以获得一些建议
在告诉她的男朋友之前和他分手，来避免可能的难过

Label_str.en: Discuss her illness with a close friend first to get guidance
Label_str.zh: 先和一个亲密的朋友讨论她的病情，以获得一些建议

Scenario.en: After a very tough breakup, Nathan is struggling to overcome feelings of sadness and loneliness, while facing serious financial issues. He finds it hard to focus on anything else.
Scenario.zh: 经历了一次非常艰难的分手后，内森正努力克服悲伤和孤独的感觉，同时还面临着严重的财务问题。他发现自己很难专注于其他任何事情。

en: Start exercising daily to get his mind off of the breakup
Start going out more and make new friends
Find a therapist to help cope with his feelings
Start taking medication to help with his sadness and loneliness
zh: 开始每天锻炼，以转移对分手的注意力
开始多出门，结交新朋友
找心理治疗师帮助处理他的情感问题
开始服用药物来帮助缓解他的悲伤和孤独感

Label_str.en: Start exercising daily to get his mind off of the breakup
Label_str.zh: 开始每天锻炼，以转移对分手的注意力

Scenario.en: Ann's sister told her that she will miss her birthday party because she couldn't get days off from work.
Scenario.zh: 安的姐姐告诉她因为不能请假，她会错过安的生日派对。

en: "This is unfair, you always do this!"
"That's alright, work is definitely more important"
"I understand, I wished you cared more about me"
"I understand, it's unfortunate but we can always celebrate some other time"
zh: “这太不公平了，你老是这样！”
“没关系，工作当然更加重要”
“我理解，我也希望你可以多关心我一点”
“我理解，真不凑巧，但我们总能找另一个时间庆祝一下的”

Label_str.en: "I understand, it's unfortunate but we can always celebrate some other time"
Label_str.zh: “我理解，真不凑巧，但我们总能找另一个时间庆祝一下的”

Scenario.en: Julie noticed that her brother had lost a lot of weight. When she asked him about it, he informed her of his recently developed eating disorder.
Scenario.zh: 朱莉注意到她哥哥瘦了很多。她问他，他告诉她最近有点饮食失调。

en: "You don't eat and that's why you are skinny! You should start eating more"
"That's tough! Well, just do what you think it's the best for you."
"I think we should find a professional to talk to"
"Let's go to a nice place. We can find something nice for you to eat"
zh: “你不吃东西，所以才这么瘦！你应该开始多吃点”
“太艰难了！我认为最好做一些对你来说感觉最好的事情”
“我认为我们应该找专家聊聊。”
“我们去个好地方吧。可以给你找点好吃的。”

Label_str.en: "I think we should find a professional to talk to"
Label_str.zh: “我认为我们应该找专家聊聊。”

Scenario.en: David's partner told him that she will not be able to attend the concert they had been planning to go together because she has to work late.
Scenario.zh: 大卫的伴侣告诉他她不能参加他们计划好的音乐会了，因为她必须工作到很晚

en: "You always choose work over our plans"
"This is disappointing, but I don't understand why work is a priority sometimes"
"I completely understand, It seems our plans are not a priority for you"
"I completely understand, work can be demanding at times"
