接受现状，退休，然后开始找份新工作
提前退休，开始他的副业

Label_str.en: Carefully consider his options and discuss it with his family
Label_str.zh: 仔细考虑他的选择，并与家人讨论

Scenario.en: Rhea has left her job to be a full-time mother, which she loves, but she misses the company and companionship of her workmates.
Scenario.zh: 瑞亚辞职做一个全职妈妈了。虽然她喜欢这样，但她还是怀念公司和同事的陪伴。

en: Enjoy being a full-time mom
Invite her workmates to babysit her baby with her
Join a playgroup or social group of new mothers
See if she can get back to her full-time position
zh: 全心全意做全职妈妈
邀请她的同事来帮忙照看宝宝
加入新妈妈的游戏小组或社交团体
看看她是否能找到全职工作

Label_str.en: Join a playgroup or social group of new mothers
Label_str.zh: 加入新妈妈的游戏小组或社交团体

Scenario.en: Pete has specific skills that his workmates do not and he feels that his workload is higher because of it.
Scenario.zh: 皮特有着同事没有的特殊技能，他觉得自己的工作量因此变得很大。

en: Speak to his boss about his heavier workload
Ask his boss to give others similar levels of workload
Be proud of his unique skills and continue working
Discuss with his workmates about their lighter workload
zh: 向他的老板谈论他的繁重工作量
要求他的老板给其他人类似水平的工作量
对他独特技能感到非常自豪
跟他的同事谈论他们较轻的工作量

Label_str.en: Speak to his boss about his heavier workload
Label_str.zh: 向他的老板谈论他的繁重工作量

Scenario.en: Surbhi starts a new job where he doesn't know anyone and finds that no one is particularly friendly.
Scenario.zh: 苏比找了一个新工作，他谁也不认识，感觉也没有特别友好的人。

en: Have fun with his friends during and outside of work hours
Concentrate on doing his work well at the new job
Make an effort to know people and be friendly
Leave the job and find one with a better environment
zh: 不论是否在工作时间，都要和朋友们一起玩得开心
专注于把新工作做好
努力去了解他人并保持友好
辞职，找一个环境更好的工作

Label_str.en: Make an effort to know people and be friendly
Label_str.zh: 努力去了解他人并保持友好

Scenario.en: Darla is nervous about presenting her work to a group of seniors who might not understand it, as they don't know much about her area.
Scenario.zh: 达拉将要向一些可能不懂的前辈展示她的工作，她对此非常紧张，因为他们对她的领域不甚了解。

en: Organize a pre-presentation session to familiarize the seniors with her area of work
Ask for someone more knowledgeable in her area to present her work instead
Work on her presentation, simplifying the explanations
Practice her presentation by speaking with people knowledgeable about her research
zh: 举办一个预讲环节来让前辈熟悉她的工作领域
请一个在她的领域更有知识的人来做展示
修改她的展示，简化解释的内容
通过和了解她的领域的人交流来练习展示

Label_str.en: Work on her presentation, simplifying the explanations
Label_str.zh: 修改她的展示，简化解释的内容

Scenario.en: Upon entering full-time study, Vincent cannot afford the time or money he used to spend on waterpolo training, which he was quite good at. Although he enjoys full-time study, he misses training
Scenario.zh: 文森特全职学习后，无法再像以前那样投入时间和金钱进行他擅长的水球训练。尽管他喜欢全职学习，但他还是怀念训练。

en: Set aside a certain amount of time each week to play water polo, and spend the remaining time on classes
Choose an alternative sport that takes less time
Find a full-time job to pay for courses
Find out about sporting scholarships or bursaries
zh: 每周抽出一定的时间进行水球运动，规划其他时间花在课程上
选择一项耗时较少的其他运动
找全职工作来支付课程费用
了解有关体育奖学金或助学金的信息

Label_str.en: Set aside a certain amount of time each week to play water polo, and spend the remaining time on classes
Label_str.zh: 每周抽出一定的时间进行水球运动，规划其他时间花在课程上

Scenario.en: Greg has just gone back to university after a lapse of several years. He is surrounded by younger students who seem very confident about their ability and he is unsure whether he can compete with them.
Scenario.zh: 格雷格几年后重新回到大学。他被一群看起来对自己的能力非常自信的年轻学生所包围，他不确定自己是否能与他们竞争。

en: Focus on his life outside the university
Study hard and attend all the lectures
Talk to others in his situation
Realize he has more life experience than the younger students
zh: 专注于他在大学之外的生活
努力学习并参加所有的讲座
贬低他人以使自己感觉良好
意识到他比年轻的学生们优越，因为他们都在他之下

Label_str.en: Study hard and attend all the lectures
Label_str.zh: 努力学习并参加所有的讲座

Scenario.en: Chris is nervous about acting a scene when there are a lot of very experienced actors in the crowd, and he doesn't have enough time to prepare more.
Scenario.zh: 克里斯在表演一个场景时感到紧张，因为观众中有很多非常有经验的演员，而他没有足够的时间来做更多准备。

en: Put things in perspective - it is not the end of the world
Use some acting techniques to calm his nerves
Believe in himself and know it will be fine
Practice his scenes more so that he will act well
zh: 正确看待事情-这并不重要，因为这不是世界末日
使用一些表演技巧来平复他的紧张
相信自己，知道一切都会好的
多练习他的戏份，这样他就能表演得很好

Label_str.en: Believe in himself and know it will be fine
Label_str.zh: 相信自己，知道一切都会好的

Scenario.en: Mark is fairly sure his company is going down and his job is under threat. It is a large company and nothing official has been said.
Scenario.zh: 马克相当确定他的公司正在走下坡路，他的工作受到威胁。这是一家大公司，但官方没有发表任何声明。

en: Find out what is happening and accept his fate
Try to keep the company afloat by working harder
Start applying for other jobs
Wait for an official announcement before taking any action
zh: 亲自去了解发生了什么并接受他的命运
努力工作以维持公司的运转
开始申请其他工作
在采取任何行动之前等待官方公告

Label_str.en: Start applying for other jobs
Label_str.zh: 开始申请其他工作

Scenario.en: Mallory moves from a small company to a very large one, where there is little personal contact and not a lot of gathering going on, which she misses.
Scenario.zh: 玛洛里从一家小公司转到一家非常大的公司，那里几乎没有个人接触，也没有太多的聚会，她很怀念这些。

en: Join in on the gatherings to make new friends at work
Talk to her workmates, try to create social contacts and make friends
Start looking for a new job so she can leave that environment
Just give it time, and things will be okay
zh: 参加聚会，和同事交新朋友
和同事交谈，尝试建立社交联系并交朋友
开始寻找新工作以便她能离开那个环境
只需给时间，一切都会好起来的

Label_str.en: Talk to her workmates, try to create social contacts and make friends
Label_str.zh: 和同事交谈，尝试建立社交联系并交朋友

Scenario.en: Ethan is feeling overwhelmed and stressed due to the demands of his college courses, while also working a part-time job. He enjoys both but is finding it hard to balance the commitments.
Scenario.zh: 伊森因为大学课程的压力以及兼职工作，感到压力过大和难以承受。他喜欢这两件事情，但发现很难平衡这些时间。

en: Drop out of college to focus on his work and earn more money
Quit his part-time job to focus on his education and get his degree
Create a detailed schedule to better manage his time
Ignore the stress and carry on as it is
zh: 退出大学，专注于他的工作并赚更多的钱
辞去他的兼职工作，专注于他的教育并获得他的学位
制定详细的时间表以更好地管理他的时间
忽视压力，继续保持现状。

Label_str.en: Create a detailed schedule to better manage his time
Label_str.zh: 制定详细的时间表以更好地管理他的时间

Scenario.en: Emily is consistently overlooked for leadership roles at her local community because she is seen as too quiet and reserved. She really wants to contribute and grow her leadership skills in this environment.
Scenario.zh: 艾米丽在当地社区经常被忽视，不被看作领导角色，因为她被认为过于安静和保守。她真的希望能在这个环境中贡献自己的力量，并提升自己的领导能力。

en: Discuss with the community and seek for their support
Look for another community that will appreciate her qualities
Speak openly to her classmates about her desires and ask for advice
Start asserting herself more in community activities to change people's perceptions.
zh: 和社区居民讨论，期望获取他们的支持
寻找另一个会欣赏她特质的社区
跟同学开放地讨论她的期望，并寻求建议
在社区活动中更加坚定地表现自己，以改变人们对她的看法。

Label_str.en: Start asserting herself more in community activities to change people's perceptions.
Label_str.zh: 在社区活动中更加坚定地表现自己，以改变人们对她的看法。

Scenario.en: Matilda has just started a new job and is trying to fit in, but she finds that her coworkers often engage in negative gossip about others at the office.
Scenario.zh: 玛蒂尔达刚开始了一份新工作，正努力融入其中，但她发现她的同事们经常在办公室里对其他人进行负面的闲言碎语。

en: Join in on the gossip to fit in
Approach her coworkers first and discuss this problem
Talk to her supervisor about the situation
Stay involved in the group and not participate in the gossip
zh: 加入八卦以融入其中
首先与她的同事接触并讨论这个问题
跟她的主管谈论这个情况
在团队中保持参与，但不参与八卦活动

Label_str.en: Approach her coworkers first and discuss this problem
Label_str.zh: 首先与她的同事接触并讨论这个问题

Scenario.en: Alex is a project manager and his team is falling behind on their work due to communication issues.
Scenario.zh: 亚历克斯是一个项目经理，由于沟通问题，他的团队在工作上落后了。

en: Implement training sessions to improve teamwork and communication skills
Implement a new project management tool to track progress
Organize an online meeting to discuss and communicate the shortcomings and find a solution together
Delegate his management responsibilities to a team member so he can focus on the tasks at hand
zh: 增加培训课来提升团队合作和沟通技巧
引入一款新的项目管理工具来跟踪进展
举办一个线上会议讨论沟通存在的问题，一同找到解决方案
将管理职责委派给团队成员以便自己能集中精力处理手头的任务

Label_str.en: Implement training sessions to improve teamwork and communication skills
Label_str.zh: 增加培训课来提升团队合作和沟通技巧

Scenario.en: Due to her expertise in the field, Naomi has been tasked to lead an important project at work. However, the project does not align with her experiences and she feels unsure about how to approach it.
Scenario.zh: 由于在这个领域的专业知识，娜奥米被指派领导一个重要的工作项目。然而，这个项目与她的经验不符，她不确定该如何处理。

en: Proceed with the project with the risk of making mistakes
Request her supervisor to reassess the situation
Lean on other team members to help shape the path forward
Refuse to lead the project due to uncertainty
zh: 承担项目，冒着犯错的风险
请求主管重新评估这个情况
依靠其他团队成员的帮助来确定前进的方向
因为不确定而拒绝领导这个项目

Label_str.en: Request her supervisor to reassess the situation
Label_str.zh: 请求主管重新评估这个情况

Scenario.en: Tom, a PhD student, has been given a piece of research work by his supervisor. While his labmates seem to find the task easy, he finds it challenging and cannot comprehend it completely.
Scenario.zh: 汤姆，一个博士研究生，已经被他的导师分配了一项研究工作。虽然他的实验室同伴们似乎觉得这项任务很容易，但他却觉得很有挑战性，无法完全理解。

en: Proceed and try to accomplish the task on his own
Admit his lack of understanding and ask his supervisor for help
Find a labmate who can help him understand the task
Take the task lightly and hope for the best
zh: 继续并尝试独自完成任务
承认自己的理解不足，并向导师寻求帮助
找到一个实验室同伴帮他理解任务
轻松对待任务，抱最好的期待

Label_str.en: Find a labmate who can help him understand the task
Label_str.zh: 找到一个实验室同伴帮他理解任务

Scenario.en: I recently received a work email from my boss criticizing a project that I've put a great amount of effort into. I feel like the criticism is unfair and not constructive.
Scenario.zh: 我最近收到了老板发的一封工作邮件，批评了我投入了大量努力的项目。我觉得这种批评不公平，也没有建设性。

en: Ignore the email and proceed with other project
Reply to the email explaining the possible misunderstanding
Reply to the email explaining that they do not understand the project
Use this criticism to enhance the project
zh: 忽略这封邮件，继续进行其他项目
回复邮件，指出可能的误解
回复邮件，指出他们不理解项目
利用这些批评来改进项目

Label_str.en: Reply to the email explaining the possible misunderstanding
Label_str.zh: 回复邮件，指出可能的误解

Scenario.en: Isabella finds out that her coworker, who started at the same time as her, is earning a higher salary for doing the same job.
Scenario.zh: 伊莎贝拉发现，和她同时开始工作的同事，做着同样的工作，却拿着更高的薪水。

en: Confront the coworker about the pay discrepancy
Go to her boss' office and fight for justice, as she deserves a higher pay
Continue the job as it is and accept the pay difference
Schedule a time and discuss the matter with her boss
zh: 直接向同事提出薪酬差异的问题
去找老板争取公正，因为她也应得到更高的薪水
继续这份工作，接受薪酬差异
安排一个时间，与老板讨论这个问题

Label_str.en: Schedule a time and discuss the matter with her boss
Label_str.zh: 安排一个时间，与老板讨论这个问题

Scenario.en: Alec has been asked to give a speech at an upcoming conference. He has never spoken to such a large audience before.
Scenario.zh: 亚历克被要求在即将召开的会议上发表演讲。他以前从未在这么多听众面前讲过话。

en: Accept this invitation as he is unsure of his performance
Spend time practicing and honing his public speaking skills
Have someone else prepare the speech for him and practice it himself
Present with less preparation to make it natural and sincere
zh: 接受这个邀请，因为他不确定自己的表现
花时间磨练他的公开演讲技巧
让别人为他准备演讲稿，自己练习
少做准备，使演讲自然而真诚

Label_str.en: Spend time practicing and honing his public speaking skills
Label_str.zh: 花时间磨练他的公开演讲技巧

Scenario.en: Patel just got promoted to the manager position at his office. He has to oversee close friends whom he was previously equal with and is unsure about setting boundaries and how this affects their relationship.
Scenario.zh: 帕特尔刚被提升为办公室经理。他必须监督以前与他势均力敌的亲密朋友，他不确定如何设定界限以及这会如何影响他们的关系。

en: Find and socialize with new friends that hold equal positions as him
Maintain the same level of social interaction but exercise authority when he wants
Favor his friends at work to maintain the relationship
Keep professional matters strictly in the office and social matters outside
zh: 寻找与他地位相同的新朋友并与之交往
保持跟之前一样的社交互动，但在他想要的时候行使权力
在工作中照顾他的朋友以维持关系
在办公室里严格对待专业事务，在外面的时候认真对待社交

Label_str.en: Keep professional matters strictly in the office and social matters outside
Label_str.zh: 在办公室里严格对待专业事务，在外面的时候认真对待社交

Scenario.en: Connor is part of a group project at his university, but he is finding it difficult to collaborate with a teammate who always dismisses his ideas.
Scenario.zh: 康纳在他的大学里参加了一个小组项目，但他发现很难与一个总是否定他的想法的队友合作。

en: Decide not to contribute to the group's ideas and follow their lead
Confront the teammate and convince him to accept his ideas
Try to understand the teammate's point of view and find a compromise
Talk to the professor about the teammate's behavior
zh: 决定不为小组贡献想法，听从他们的队长的
直面队友，说服他接受他的想法
试着理解队友的观点，找到一个中立的想法
和教授谈谈队友的行为

Label_str.en: Try to understand the teammate's point of view and find a compromise
Label_str.zh: 试着理解队友的观点，找到一个中立的想法

Scenario.en: Jess is going to graduate soon and has been job hunting for the past weeks. She doesn't want to continue in academia but due to the intense job market, she has been finding it hard to find a job.
Scenario.zh: 杰西马上就要毕业了，过去几周一直在找工作。她不想继续在学术界工作，但由于就业市场竞争激烈，她发现很难找到工作。

en: Take a part-time job or an internship before she graduates
Continue to seek for a full-time position and she will end up finding one
Consider post-graduate education for additional training
Reassess her job search strategy and improve her application materials
zh: 在她毕业前找一份兼职或实习
继续寻找一份全职工作，并且她最终会找到的
考虑读研获得更多培训
重新评估她的求职策略，改进她的申请材料

Label_str.en: Reassess her job search strategy and improve her application materials
Label_str.zh: 重新评估她的求职策略，改进她的申请材料

Scenario.en: Ruby was just offered the job of her dreams in an outstanding company, but the position is in a different city, and moving would mean leaving her family and close friends behind.
Scenario.zh: 鲁比刚刚在一家优秀的公司得到了她梦寐以求的工作，但这份工作在另一个城市，搬家去那里意味着她要离开她的家人和好朋友。

en: Reject the job offer and stay with her friends
Accept the job and make new friends in the new city
Try discussing with her friends the situation she is facing now
Accept the job, visit her friends often in her current city
zh: 拒绝工作邀请，和她的朋友呆在一起
接受工作，在新的城市结交新朋友
试着和她的朋友讨论她现在面临的情况
接受工作，经常去她现在的城市看她的朋友

Label_str.en: Try discussing with her friends the situation she is facing now
Label_str.zh: 试着和她的朋友讨论她现在面临的情况

Scenario.en: It's Paolo's first time attending a conference and he came with some of his labmates. He wants to make new connections but is struggling to do so due to his introverted nature.
Scenario.zh: 这是保罗第一次参加会议，他和一些实验室同伴一起来的。他想建立新的联系，但由于他内向的性格，这让他感到有些困难。

en: Look for and attend social gatherings that are a part of the conference
Take breaks in between sessions and utilize the coffee break areas provided to strike up conversations with new people
Start by joining some smaller group discussions or workshops and meeting people there
Attend events with his labmates and try to meet new people through them, expanding his network step by step
zh: 寻找并参加会议中的社交聚会
在会议间隙休息，并利用提供的咖啡休息区与新人交谈
从参加一些较小的小组讨论或研讨会开始，然后在那里结识新朋友
与实验室同伴一起参加活动，并通过他们结识新朋友，逐步扩大自己的人脉网络

Label_str.en: Start by joining some smaller group discussions or workshops and meeting people there
Label_str.zh: 从参加一些较小的小组讨论或研讨会开始，然后在那里结识新朋友

Scenario.en: Sana's boss tells her she didn't get the promotion she worked so hard for.
Scenario.zh: 萨娜的老板告诉她她没有得到她非常努力工作想要得到的晋升。

en: “Nevertheless, I will continue to work hard in my new job”
“It's okay, I will continue to work hard”
“It's always the unworthy people who get promotions”
“I understand, I think I didn't put enough effort"
zh: “尽管如此，我也会在我的新工作中继续努力的”
“没关系的，我还会继续努力”
“总是不值的人获得了晋升”
“我理解，我认为我还不够努力”

Label_str.en: “It's okay, I will continue to work hard”
Label_str.zh: “没关系的，我还会继续努力”

Scenario.en: During an important company meeting, Ed's colleague pointed out an error he had made in a report in front of the entire team.
Scenario.zh: 在一次重要的公司会议上，埃德的同事在整个团队面前指出了他在报告中犯的一次错误。

en: “You could have told me privately, it's really unnecessary”
“I promise I won't make the same mistake again, thank you for pointing it out”
“Thank you for pointing out my mistake in front of so many people and helping me improve”
“Everyone makes mistakes, I will try to correct it when I have time.”
zh: “你可以私下告诉我的，这真没必要”
“我保证不再出错了，谢谢你指出”
"谢谢你在这么多人面前指出我的错误，帮助我进步"
“每个人都会犯错，在我有空时我会努力修正它”

Label_str.en: “I promise I won't make the same mistake again, thank you for pointing it out”
Label_str.zh: “我保证不再出错了，谢谢你指出”

Scenario.en: Adam and I have developed a healthy work relationship and always respect each other. But yesterday, he just snapped at me for no apparent reason.
Scenario.zh: 亚当和我建立了一个健康的工作关系，并且总是相互尊重。但昨天他没有明显理由地冲我大发脾气。

en: "You have no right to talk to me like that"
"Is there something bothering you? You seem upset"
"I don't think it's healthy to continue working together"
"I'm sorry but I have to report you for this behavior"
zh: “你无权这么和我说话”
“有什么事情困扰你吗？你看起来很沮丧”
“我认为继续一起工作是不健康的”
“不好意思，但我必须报告你的这种行为”

Label_str.en: "Is there something bothering you? You seem upset"

Scenario.en: Jacob's classmate just announced that she scored the highest in our recent exam, which Jacob had studied hard for but didn't perform that well.

"I'm sorry I didn't notice, I'll try to be more considerate"

zh: "对不起，你有考虑过买耳塞吗？"

Label_str.en: "I'm sorry I didn't notice, I'll try to be more considerate"

Scenario.zh: 我的同事刚刚告诉我，她被提升到了我非常想要的职位。

Scenario.en: Adam recently found out that he was turned down for a project proposal at work that he was very excited about.
Scenario.zh: 亚当最近发现他非常期待的工作项目提案被拒绝了。

"Well, I should have known better, I should've put more effort into it"
"I need to ask for feedback so I can make improvements next time"

"我需要寻求反馈，这样我下次可以做得更好"
"我并不感到惊讶，我知道我的想法对这里来说太过于超前了"

Scenario.en: Emma, who works at a law firm, received negative feedback from clients today, saying her work was disorganized and her strategy was confusing. But after the inspection, Emma found that many of the customer reviews had logical contradictions.
Scenario.zh: 在律师事务所工作的艾玛，今天收到了来自客户的负面反馈，称她的工作杂乱无章，而她的策略令人困惑。但是检查后艾玛发现，客户的很多评价都逻辑矛盾。

en: "I generally use the same tactics and have never received any complaints before"
"I sincerely apologize. I will make the necessary changes and updates to make it more comprehensive"
"I'm sorry you feel that way, can we talk about this when you have time?"
"Thank you for your suggestion. I think there are some issues with your feedback"
zh: "我通常使用相同的策略，并且以前从未收到过任何投诉"
"我真诚地道歉。我将进行必要的改变和更新，使其更全面"
"很抱歉您有这样的感觉，您方便在合适的时候谈一谈吗？"
"谢谢您的建议，我认为您的反馈有一些问题。"

Label_str.en: "I'm sorry you feel that way, can we talk about this when you have time?"
Label_str.zh: "很抱歉您有这样的感觉，您方便在合适的时候谈一谈吗？"

Scenario.en: My team leader at work just informed me that I need to work this weekend, but I already made plans that I was excited about.
Scenario.zh: 我的工作团队负责人刚刚通知我，我需要在这个周末工作，但是我已经做了我很期待的计划。

en: "This is completely unfair. Work should not take away from an employee's personal time"
"I'm really sorry, but I haven't been feeling well lately and I'd like to take a day off if possible"
"I understand the situation. Can we find a compromise?"
"I'm very sorry. Can you adjust your working hours or assign them to other colleagues? Thank you for your understanding"
zh: "这完全不公平。工作不应该占用员工的个人时间"
"我真的很抱歉，但我最近身体感觉不太好，如果可能的话我想请一天假"
"我理解现在的情况。我们能找到一个妥协的方法吗？"
"非常抱歉，能否调整工作时间或者分配给其他同事呢？谢谢理解。"

Label_str.en: "I understand the situation. Can we find a compromise?"
Label_str.zh: "我理解现在的情况。我们能找到一个妥协的方法吗？"

Scenario.en: My neighbor told me that she feels like she's failing as a mother because she's always tired and doesn't play with her kids as much.
Scenario.zh: 我邻居告诉我，她觉得得自己作为一个母亲很失败，因为她总是很累，没有太多时间和孩子们玩。

en: "It's a normal reaction since taking care of kids is hard. Remember to take care of yourself too"
"Maybe you should hire a nanny to help"
"Being a parent is hard and it's okay to feel tired. You're not doing a great job even if you feel like it right now"
"You should talk to other dads, they probably feel the same"
zh: “照顾孩子是件难事，感到这样是正常的反应。记得也要照顾好自己”
“也许你应该雇个保姆来帮忙”
“做父母是很难的，感到累是正常的。你做得不是很好，即使你这么觉得”
“你可以和其他爸爸们交流，他们可能也有同样的感受”

Label_str.en: "It's a normal reaction since taking care of kids is hard. Remember to take care of yourself too"

Scenario.en: Dani's supervisor has just given him a huge amount of work with a very short deadline
Scenario.zh: 丹尼的主管刚刚给了他大量的工作，而截止日期非常紧迫。

"Of course, even if I have to pull an all-nighter"

"当然，就算需要通宵达旦"
"我认为难度可能有点大，有别人可以一起帮忙吗？"

Label_str.zh: "我认为难度可能有点大，有别人可以一起帮忙吗？"

Scenario.en: My neighbor loves to organize weekly small gatherings. But due to my busy schedule, I haven't been able to attend recently. Today, she confronted me about it.
Scenario.zh: 我的邻居喜欢每周组织小型聚会。但因为我近来日程很满，一直没能参加。今天，她因此找上门来问我了。

en: "Unfortunately, my work is demanding. I can't help it if I'm busy."
"I apologize that you feel neglected but I hope you understand that I have responsibilities."

zh: “很遗憾，我的工作要求很高。如果我忙起来，真的是没办法。”
“很抱歉让你感到被忽视了，但我希望你能理解我也有自己的责任。”
“对不起，最近工作实在太忙了。我们试着协调一下时间怎么样？”
“你为什么不找其他人参加呢？”

Label_str.en: "I'm sorry. I have been swamped with work lately. Let's try matching our schedules, shall we?"

Scenario.en: Grant usually plays soccer with his classmate for fun. Last week, they decided to participate in a competition, and his classmate was shouting at him for every mistake during the game.
Scenario.zh: 格兰特通常和同学一起踢足球玩乐。上周，他们决定参加一个比赛，但在比赛中，每当他犯错，他的同学就对他大喊大叫。

en: "Don't overreact. It's just a game."
"I'm sorry, I'll make sure to be more careful next time"
"We play just for fun. No need to get angry."
"I think you can tell me instead of yellling. We are a team and we should support each other"
zh: “别反应过激。这只是个游戏而已。”
“对不起，我会确保下次更加小心。”
“我们踢球只是为了好玩，没必要生气。”
“我觉得你可以直接告诉我，而不是大喊大叫。我们是一个团队，应该相互支持。”

Label_str.en: "I think you can tell me instead of yellling. We are a team and we should support each other"
Label_str.zh: “我觉得你可以直接告诉我，而不是大喊大叫。我们是一个团队，应该相互支持。”

Scenario.en: During a meeting to discuss our project's progress, my colleague accused me of not working hard enough in front of the team.
Scenario.zh: 在一次讨论我们项目进展的会议上，我的同事当着团队的面指责我工作不够努力。

en: "While I appreciate your input, the division of work has been made and I am working hard on my part"
"That's an interesting perspective. I believe I've put in a substantial amount of work on this project."
"I'm sorry you feel that way, I've been doing my best, so I think you can appreciate my effort"
"We can discuss your thoughts in detail after the meeting to work out a solution"
zh: 虽然我感激你的意见，但工作已经分配好了，我在我的部分确实很努力。
这个观点很让我震惊。我觉得我已经在这个项目上投入了大量工作。
很抱歉你这么想，我已经尽力了，所以我认为你可以欣赏我的努力。
会议结束后，我们可以详细讨论你的想法，找出一个解决方案。

Label_str.en: "While I appreciate your input, the division of work has been made and I am working hard on my part"
Label_str.zh: 虽然我感激你的意见，但工作已经分配好了，我在我的部分确实很努力。

Scenario.en: Dea is always embarrassed to speak in class and always keeps quiet. Recently, she was informed by her teacher that her class participation grades are low and she needs to be more active to pass.
Scenario.zh: 迪娅在课堂上总是感到尴尬，总是保持沉默。最近，她的老师告诉她，她的课堂参与成绩很低，需要更积极一些才能及格。

en: "Can't I just keep attending the class? I am too shy to speak"
"Can I contribute in other ways than being active in class?"

"I guess I'll try to speak more despite being shy"
zh: “我能不能只是继续上课？我说话会害羞。”
“除了在课堂上积极发言，我能以其他方式贡献吗？”
“您一定弄错了，我一直都在参与。”
“虽然害羞，但我会尽力多说话。”

Label_str.en: "Can I contribute in other ways than being active in class?"
Label_str.zh: “除了在课堂上积极发言，我能以其他方式贡献吗？”

Scenario.en: Yesterday, we handed in our project reports to the supervisor. I found out that a labmate scolded me in his report for a mistake that he believed I made, but it was actually his fault.
Scenario.zh: 昨天，我们向主管提交了我们的项目报告。我发现，一个实验室同伴在他的报告中因为一个他认为是我犯的错误而责骂我，但实际上是他的错。

en: "Making mistakes is fine but putting your mistakes onto others is not"
"That is not right. I believe that part was your responsibility"
"Let's go through the situation together again to clarify the misunderstanding"
"Well, I wasn't the one who made the mistake"
zh: “犯错误没关系，但把自己的错误归咎于别人就不对了”
“这样不太对。我记得那部分是你负责的”
“我们一起再回顾一下这个情况，澄清这个误会吧”
“嗯，犯那个错误的不是我

Label_str.en: "Let's go through the situation together again to clarify the misunderstanding"
Label_str.zh: “我们一起再回顾一下这个情况，澄清这个误会吧”

Scenario.en: Bob's teammate took over most of the final Q&A session for their group project and spoke over Bob, making Bob's contributions and understanding of the project seem insignificant.
Scenario.zh: 鲍勃的团队成员在他们小组项目的最后一个问答环节中主导了大部分对话，并且打断了鲍勃，这让鲍勃的贡献和对项目的理解显得微不足道。

en: "Could you please credit me for the work?"
"Great point, but I have some additional input that I would like to say"
"It's best to let me speak instead of you speaking over me"
"Well, it seems like you have all the answers, so why are we even here?"
zh: “能请你给我一些我工作的认可吗？”
“这个观点很好，但我还有一些补充意见想要说。”
“最好让我自己说，而不是你打断我。”
“嗯，看起来你已经有了所有答案，那我们还在这里干嘛呢？”

Label_str.en: "Great point, but I have some additional input that I would like to say"
Label_str.zh: “这个观点很好，但我还有一些补充意见想要说。”

Scenario.en: Jane's neighbor has been spreading false rumors about her in the community, which heavily affects her reputation.
Scenario.zh: 简的邻居在社区里散布关于她的假消息，这严重影响了她的名誉。

"Why would you do such a thing? Have I done something wrong?"
"I guess it's only fair if I make some rumors about you and we're even"
"That was out of line. If you have any problems with me, you can bring it up to me and we can figure things out"
zh: “如果你不喜欢我，直接当面说就好了。”
“你为什么要这么做？我做错了什么吗？”
“看来我也该编点关于你的谣言，这样我们就扯平了。”
“你这样做太过分了。如果你对我有什么问题，直接跟我说，我们可以一起解决。”

Label_str.en: "That was out of line. If you have any problems with me, you can bring it up to me and we can figure things out"
Label_str.zh: “你这样做太过分了。如果你对我有什么问题，直接跟我说，我们可以一起解决。”

Scenario.en: Karen was working when her manager called her to his office. He said that the company will be reducing her work hours next week, but she needs the extra money.
Scenario.zh: 凯伦正在工作，经理把她叫到办公室。他说公司下周将减少她的工作时间，但她需要额外的钱。

en: "This is not fair, I need hours to pay my bills"
"Thank you for the notice, but is there a workaround to this? I can't afford to lose the money."
"I understand, is there any way that I can pick up some more extra shifts?"
"Thank you for informing me, I'll adjust my schedule accordingly."
zh: “这不公平，我需要这几个小时的工资来支付我的账单”
“谢谢你的通知，但有没有解决办法?我没法承受失去这笔钱。”
“我明白，有没有办法让我多加班?”
“谢谢你的通知，我会相应地调整我的日程安排。”

Label_str.en: "I understand, is there any way that I can pick up some more extra shifts?"
Label_str.zh: “我明白，有没有办法让我多加班?”

Scenario.en: After a project meeting, the TA pulled Ian aside to talk to him privately. She gave him some feedback about his presentation, which was not really helpful nor constructive.
Scenario.zh: 项目会议结束后，助教把伊恩单独拉到一边私下谈话。她对他的演讲提供了一些反馈，但这些反馈既不实用也不具建设性。

en: "Thank you for your comments However, I think there might be some misunderstandings that we could clarify"
"Oh, thank you for giving your insights. Fortunately, I think they don't apply to my situation"
"Thank you, I really appreciate your feedback I'll work on what you pointed out"
"I see! I appreciate your input I think I did my best and I liked the presentation, but I will work on your comments"
zh: 谢谢您的评论。不过，我认为可能有一些误解，我们可以澄清一下。
哦，谢谢您提供的见解。幸运的是，我认为这些并不适用于我的情况。
谢谢，我真的很感激您的反馈。我会努力改进您指出的问题。
我明白了！我感激您的意见。我认为我已经尽力了，我也喜欢我的演讲，但我会按照您的评论进行改进。

Label_str.en: "Thank you for your comments However, I think there might be some misunderstandings that we could clarify"
Label_str.zh: 谢谢您的评论。不过，我认为可能有一些误解，我们可以澄清一下。

Scenario.en: Frank and his team gave the proposal presentation today. While the teacher didn't have any comments, the teaching assistant gave them some feedback, which was not constructive criticism and they didn't find it helpful as it felt like he didn't understand their presentation.
Scenario.zh: 弗兰克和他的团队今天做了提案报告。而老师没有任何评论，助教给了他们一些反馈。这不是建设性的反馈，他们觉得没有帮助，因为感觉他没有理解他们的报告。

en: "We appreciate your feedback, is there any chance we could discuss further?"
"Can we ask for feedback from a person who listened to the presentation?"
"Thank you, we really appreciate your feedback. We'll work on what you pointed out."
"We don't think you fully understood our presentation"
zh: “感谢您的反馈，我们有机会进一步讨论吗?”
“我们能从听过演示的人那里得到反馈吗?”
“谢谢你，我们非常感谢你的反馈。我们会按照你所说的去做。”
“我们认为你没有完全理解我们的演示”

Label_str.en: "We appreciate your feedback, is there any chance we could discuss further?"
Label_str.zh: “感谢您的反馈，我们有机会进一步讨论吗?”

Scenario.en: Kyle practiced his project plan with his labmate, Gary, and was heavily criticized. However, during the meeting when the supervisor was present, Gary started giving positive feedback on his plan.
Scenario.zh: 凯尔和他的实验室同伴加里一起练习他的项目计划时，遭到了严厉的批评。然而，在主管在场的会议上，加里开始对他的计划给予积极的反馈。

en: "Thanks for your input. If anyone else has feedback or suggestions for improvements, I'd welcome them as well"
"Thank you, Gary, for your positive feedback in the meeting. It means a lot to me"
"Thank you for your feedback. Our earlier discussion gave me a different impression. Can we go over these points again?"
"I appreciate your feedback. Can we discuss this in more detail after the meeting so I can understand your concerns better?
zh: 谢谢你的意见。如果其他人也有反馈或改进建议，我也非常欢迎。
谢谢你，加里，在会议上给予的正面反馈。这对我很重要。
谢谢你的反馈。我们之前的讨论给了我不同的印象。我们能再次讨论这些要点吗？
我感激你的反馈。会议后我们能详细讨论一下吗，这样我可以更好地理解你的顾虑？

Label_str.en: "Thank you for your feedback. Our earlier discussion gave me a different impression. Can we go over these points again?"
Label_str.zh: 谢谢你的反馈。我们之前的讨论给了我不同的印象。我们能再次讨论这些要点吗？

Scenario.zh: 马特决定参加黑客马拉松。然而，当他们的团队项目开始时，他却忙于其他项目，无法真正为项目做出贡献。

en: "Hey, could you guys cover the parts I'm responsible for, I've been really busy recently"
"I'm so sorry, I've been really busy with other projects and didn't have time to complete it"
"I can just join another team if you guys feel that's the best option"
"I have prioritized the other projects, so I will get to my parts when I'm done with those"
zh: “嘿，你们能帮我负责的部分吗，我最近真的很忙”
“很抱歉，我一直忙于其他项目，没有时间完成它”
“如果你们觉得这是最好的选择，我可以加入另一个团队”
“我已经优先考虑了其他项目，所以当我完成这些项目时，我会去做我的部分”

Label_str.en: "I'm so sorry, I've been really busy with other projects and didn't have time to complete it"
Label_str.zh: “很抱歉，我一直忙于其他项目，没有时间完成它”
